1.1: Nsɛm a efi Yeremia nkyɛn ni. Yeremia yɛ Hilkia babarima a na ɔyɛ Anatot asɔfo no mu baako wɔ Benyamin asase so.
1.2: Awurade asɛm baa ne nkyɛn wɔ Yosia a ɔyɛ Yuda hene Amon babarima adedi afe a ɛto so dumiɛnsa no mu.
1.3: Ɛtoaa so wɔ Yuda hene Yosia babarima Yehoiakim bere so, kosii Yuda hene Yosia babarima Sedekia bere so a nnipa a wɔte Yerusalem kɔɔ nkoasom mu wɔ adedi no afe a ɛto so dubaako no ɔsram a ɛto so anum no mu.
1.4: Yeremia FrɛAwurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se,
1.5: “Ansa na mereyɛ wo wɔ awotwaa mu no na minim wo;ansa na wɔrebɛwo wo no, miyii wo sii nkyɛn;meyɛɛ wo odiyifo maa aman no.”
1.6: Mekae se, “Aa, Otumfo Awurade minnim kasa; meyɛ abofra.”
1.7: Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Nka se ‘meyɛ abofra.’ Ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ obiara a mɛsoma wo no nkyɛn na woka asɛm biara a mɛhyɛ wo sɛ ka no.
1.8: Nsuro wɔn, efisɛ meka wo ho, na magye wo,” nea Awurade se ni.
1.9: Na Awurade teɛɛ ne nsa de kaa mʼano na ɔka kyerɛɛ me se, “Mprempren mede me nsɛm ahyɛ wʼanom.
1.10: Hwɛ, nnɛ, mede wo asi aman ne ahenni so sɛ, tutu na dwiriw gu, sɛe na tu gu, kyekyere na dua.”
1.11: Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se, “Dɛn na wuhu yi, Yeremia?”Na mibuae se, “Mihu ɔsonkoran dubaa.”
1.12: Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Wahu no yiye, na merehwɛ anim sɛ mʼasɛm bɛba mu.”
1.13: Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn bio se, “Dɛn na wuhu yi?”Mibuae se, “Mihu kuku a ɛrehuru sɛ ano rekyea akyerɛ yɛn fi atifi fam.”
1.14: Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Wobefi atifi fam de amanehunu aba wɔn a wɔte asase no so nyinaa so.
1.15: Merebɛfrɛ atifi ahenni mu nnipa nyinaa,” nea Awurade se ni.“Wɔn ahemfo de wɔn ahengua bɛbaabesisi Yerusalem kuropɔn apon ano;wɔbɛtow ahyɛ nʼafasu a atwa ahyiane Yuda nkurow nyinaa so.
1.16: Mebu me nkurɔfo atɛnwɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ sɛ wɔagyaw me,sɛ wɔhyew nnuhuam ma anyame afoforona wɔkotow sɔre nea wɔde wɔn nsa ayɛ.
1.17: “Siesie wo ho! Sɔre na ka nea mɛka akyerɛ wo biara kyerɛ wɔn. Mma wɔmmmɔ wo hu, anyɛ saa a mɛma woabɔ hu wɔ wɔn anim.
1.18: Nnɛ, mayɛ wo kuropɔn a ɛwɔ bammɔ, dadedum ne kɔbere fasu sɛ wobɛsɔre atia asase no nyinaa, Yuda ahemfo, nʼadwumayɛfo, asɔfo ne nnipa a wɔwɔ asase no so.
1.19: Wɔbɛko atia wo, nanso wɔrentumi nni wo so nkonim, efisɛ meka wo ho na megye wo,” sɛnea Awurade se ni.

2.1: Israel Pa Onyankopɔn AkyiAwurade asɛm baa me so:
2.2: “Kɔpae mu ka ma Yerusalem nte:“ ‘Mekae sɛnea wode wo ho maa me wo mmabun bere mu,sɛnea wodɔɔ me wɔ wʼayeforo bere muna wudii mʼakyi wɔ sare so,asase a wonnuaa hwee wɔ so no.
2.3: Na Israel yɛ kronkron ma Awurade,ne twabere mu aduankan;wɔn a wodii nʼani no wobuu wɔn fɔ,na amanehunu baa wɔn so,’ ”sɛnea Awurade, se ni.
2.4: Muntie Awurade asɛm, mo Yakob asefo,mo Israel mmusuakuw nyinaa.
2.5: Eyi ne nea Awurade se:“Mfomso bɛn na mo agyanom huu wɔ me ho aɛma wɔtwee wɔn ho kɔɔ akyirikyiri sɛɛ?Wodii ahoni a wɔn so nni mfaso akyi,maa wɔn ankasa bɛyɛɛ ahuhufo.
2.6: Wɔammisa se, ‘Ɛhe na Awurade wɔ?Nea oyii yɛn fii Misraimna ɔde yɛn faa sare wosee so,nweatam ne abonabon asasea awo na ayɛ owubon no.Asase a obiara mfa so na obiara nte so no.’
2.7: Mede mo beduaa asasebere sosɛ munni so nnuaba ne ɛso nnepa.Nanso mubeguu mʼasase ho fi,na moyɛɛ mʼagyapade akyiwade.
2.8: Asɔfo no ammisa se,‘Ɛhe na Awurade wɔ?’Wɔn a wɔde mmara yɛ adwuma no anhwehwɛ me;ntuanofo sɔre tiaa me.Adiyifo no de Baal hyɛɛ nkɔm,na wodii ahoni huhuw akyi.
2.9: “Ɛno nti, merebɔ mo kwaadu bio,”nea Awurade se ni.“Na mɛbɔ mo mma mma kwaadu.
2.10: Muntwa nkɔ Kitim mpoano nkɔhwɛ,monsoma nkɔ Kedar nkɔhwehwɛ mu yiye;monhwɛ sɛ biribi a ɛte sɛɛ asi wɔ hɔ:
2.11: Ɔman bi asesa wɔn anyame pɛn ana?Nso wɔnnyɛ anyame mpo.Nanso me nkurɔfo de wɔn anuonyamasesa ahoni huhuw.
2.12: Mo ɔsorosoro, momma mo ho nnwiriw mo wɔ eyi ho,na mo ho nwosow wɔ akomatu mu,”nea Awurade se ni.
2.13: “Me nkurɔfo ayɛ bɔne ahorow abien:Wɔapa me,me a meyɛ nkwa asubura no,na wɔatutu wɔn ankasa mmura amoa,mmura a apaapae a entumi nkora nsu.
2.14: Israel yɛ akoa anaa ɔsomfo fi awo mu ana?Adɛn nti na wayɛ asade yi?
2.15: Gyata abobɔ mu;wɔaworo so akyerɛ no.Wɔama nʼasase ada mpan;wɔahyehyew ne nkurow ayɛ no amamfo.
2.16: Afei Memfis ne Tapanhes mmarimaayi wo ti so nwi.
2.17: Ɛnyɛ wo na woama eyi aba wo sosɛ wopaa Awurade wo Nyankopɔn akyi,wɔ bere a ɔrekyerɛ wo kwan no?
2.18: Afei adɛn nti na wokɔ Misraimkɔnom Sihor mu nsu?Na adɛn nti na wokɔ Asiriakɔnom Asubɔnten no mu nsu?
2.19: Wo amumɔyɛ bɛtwe wʼaso;wo nsanakyi bɛka wʼanim.Enti dwene ho na hu sɛ,sɛ wopa Awurade wo Nyankopɔn akyina woannya ne ho suro a,ɛyɛ bɔne ne ɔyaw ma wo.”Awurade, Asafo Awurade na ose.
2.20: “Tete mmere no, wububuu wo konnua mu,na wotetew wo nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu;na wokae se, ‘Merensom wo!’Ampa, wɔ koko biara sone dua biara a adennan asena wotena bɔɔ aguaman.
2.21: Miduaa wo sɛ bobe ankasaa efi bobe a ase ye pa ara mu.Na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wodan wʼakyi kyerɛɛ mebɛyɛɛ bobe a anyin asɛe wɔ wura mu yi?
2.22: Sɛ wode sodane samina bebree guare mpo a,wʼafɔdi nkekae da so wɔ mʼanim ara,”sɛnea Otumfo Awurade se ni.
2.23: “Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woaka se, ‘Me ho nguu fi ɛ;minnii Baalnom akyi ɛ’?Hwɛ sɛnea woyɛɛ wo ho wɔ obon no mu;dwene nea woayɛ no ho.Woyɛ yomabere hoɔharefoa wutu mmirika kɔ ha ba ha,
2.24: wura mu afurum a nweatam so tena akokwaw no,ohuahua bere a ɔpɛ sɛ onini hyia no.Sɛ nʼakɔnnɔ no ano yɛ den a hena na obesianka no?Anini biara a wɔtaa no no nhaw wɔn ho bebree;edu bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wohyia no a wobenya no.
2.25: Ntu mmirika nkosi sɛ wʼanan ase bɛyɛ kwaterekwa,na wo mene mu bɛyow.Nanso wokae se, ‘So nni mfaso!Mepɛ ananafo anyame,na ɛsɛ sɛ midi wɔn akyi.’
2.26: “Sɛnea wɔkyere ɔkorɔmfo a wogu nʼanim ase no,saa na wɔagu Israelfi anim ase,wɔn ankasa, wɔn ahemfo ne wɔn adwumayɛfo,wɔn asɔfo ne wɔn adiyifo.
2.27: Wɔka kyerɛ dua se, ‘Woyɛ mʼagya,’ne ɔbo se, ‘Wo na wowoo me.’Wɔadan wɔn akyi akyerɛ mena ɛnyɛ wɔn anim;nanso sɛ amanehunu bi ba wɔn so a, wɔka se,‘Bra begye yɛn!’
2.28: Anyame a moyɛ maa mo ho no wɔ he?Momma wɔmmra sɛ wobetumi agye mobere a mowɔ amanehunu mu!Efisɛ mowɔ anyame bebreete sɛ nea mowɔ nkurow bebree no, Yuda.
2.29: “Adɛn nti na mobɔ me sobo?Mo nyinaa ayɛ dɔm atia me,”Awurade na ose.
2.30: “Metwee mo nkurɔfo aso kwa;wɔamfa me nteɛso.Wʼafoa akunkum wʼadiyifote sɛ gyata a nʼani abere.
2.31: “Mo nnɛmmafo, munnwen Awurade asɛm ho:“Mayɛ sɛ, nweatam ama Israel ana?Anaasɛ asase a so aduru sum kabii ana?Adɛn nti na me nkurɔfo ka se, ‘Yɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ yekyinkyin;yɛremma wo nkyɛn bio.’
2.32: Ɔbabun werɛ fi ne mpempranne,ayeforo werɛ befi nʼahyehyɛde ana?Nanso me nkurɔfo werɛ afi menna a wontumi nkan.
2.33: Hwɛ nyansa a mowɔ de pɛ mo adɔfo!Mmea a wɔnsɛ hwee koraa tumi sua mo akwan.
2.34: Mo adurade mu wɔahiafo a wodi bem mogya,nanso moankyere wɔn sɛ wɔrebubu akɔ mu.Eyinom nyinaa akyi
2.35: woka se, ‘Midi bem;ne bo mfuw me.’Nanso mebu wo atɛnefisɛ woka se, ‘Menyɛɛ bɔne biara ɛ.’
2.36: Adɛn nti na wukyinkyin sɛɛ,sesa wʼakwan?Misraim bedi wo huammɔsɛnea Asiria yɛe no.
2.37: Afei wubefi saa beae hɔa wo nsa gu wo ti so.Efisɛ Awurade apo wɔn a wode wo ho too wɔn so no;wɔremmoa wo.

3.1: “Sɛ ɔbarima gyaa ne yerena ɔbea no kɔware ɔbarima foforo a,ɛsɛ sɛ ɔbarima no san kɔ ɔbea no nkyɛn ana?Ɛremma asase no ho ngu fi koraa ana?Nanso wo ne adɔfo bebree abɔ aguaman,na mprempren de wobɛsan aba me nkyɛn ana?”Awurade na ose.
3.2: “Ma wʼani so hwɛ nkoko no so.Baabi wɔ hɔ a wɔntoo wo mmonnaa da ana?Wotenaa kwankyɛn twɛn adɔfo,wotenaa sɛ mmoahwɛfo a wodi atutena wɔ nweatam so.Woagu asase no ho fi,wode wʼaguamammɔ ne wʼamumɔyɛ na ayɛ.
3.3: Enti wɔatwe obosu asan,na asusowbere su antɔ.Nanso wʼanim ayɛ sɛ oguamanfo a ɔmfɛre hwee;wʼani nwu hwee.
3.4: Nnansa yi ara, woamfrɛ me se:‘Mʼagya, me mmabunmmere mu adamfo,
3.5: wo bo befuw biribiara ana?Wʼabufuwhyew no bɛkɔ so daa ana?’Sɛɛ na wokasa,nanso woyɛ bɔne nyinaa sɛnea wutumi.”
3.6: Israel A Onni NokwareƆhene Yosia adedi bere so no, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Woahu nea Israel a onni nokware no ayɛ? Wakɔ nkoko nyinaa so ne dua a adennan biara ase akɔsɛe aware wɔ hɔ.
3.7: Misusuwii sɛ anka wayɛ eyinom nyinaa akyi no, ɔbɛsan aba me nkyɛn nanso wamma, na ne nuabea Yuda a ɔno nso nka nokware no hui.
3.8: Memaa Israel a onni nokware no awaregyae nhoma na mepam no esiane nʼawaresɛe abrabɔ nti. Nanso mihuu sɛ ne nuabea Yuda a onni nokware no ansuro; ɔno nso kɔbɔɔ aguaman bra.
3.9: Esiane sɛ Israel aguamammɔ anyɛ no asɛnhia nti, ɔde fi kaa asase no na ɔne abo ne nnua bɔɔ aguaman.
3.10: Eyinom nyinaa akyi no, ne nuabea Yuda amfi ne koma nyinaa mu ansan amma me nkyɛn, ɔyɛ de kyerɛɛ kɛkɛ,” sɛnea Awurade se ni.
3.11: Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Israel a onni nokware no teɛ sen Yuda okontomponi no.
3.12: Kɔ, fa wʼani kyerɛ atifi fam kɔka saa nsɛm yi kyerɛ wɔn:“ ‘San wʼakyi, Israel a onni nokware,’ Sɛɛ na Awurade se,‘Meremmuna nkyerɛ wo bio,efisɛ meyɛ mmɔborɔhunufo,’ sɛɛ na Awurade se,‘Me bo remfuw afebɔɔ.
3.13: Gye wo afɔdi to mu,woatew Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn anim atua,woakyekyɛ wʼadɔe mu ama ananafo anyamewɔ dua biara a adennan ase,na woanyɛ osetie amma me,’ ”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
3.14: “Monsan mo akyi, mo akyirisanfo,” sɛnea Awurade se ni, “efisɛ meyɛ mo kunu. Meyi wo; ɔbaako befi kurow mu na baanu afi abusuakuw mu, na mede mo aba Sion.
3.15: Afei mɛma mo nguanhwɛfo a wɔda me koma so, wɔn a wɔde nimdeɛ ne ntease bɛkyerɛ mo ɔkwan.
3.16: Saa nna no mu, sɛ mo dɔɔso bebree wɔ asase no so a,” Awurade na ose, “nnipa renka bio se, ‘Awurade apam adaka no.’ Ɛremma wɔn adwene mu anaa wɔrenkae da; wɔn kɔn rennɔ na wɔrenyɛ foforo nso.
3.17: Saa bere no wɔbɛfrɛ Yerusalem Awurade Ahengua, na amanaman nyinaa behyia wɔ Yerusalem abɛkamfo Awurade din. Na wɔrenni wɔn koma bɔne a ɛma wɔyɛ asoɔden no akyi bio.
3.18: Saa nna no mu, Yuda fi bɛka Israelfi ho, na wɔabɔ mu afi atifi fam asase bi so aba asase a mede maa mo agyanom sɛ agyapade no so.
3.19: “Mʼankasa mekae se,‘Anka ɛbɛyɛ me anigye sɛ mɛyɛ mo sɛ mmana mama mo asase a eye,agyapade a edi mu ma ɔman biara.’Misusuwii sɛ mobɛfrɛ me ‘Agya’na monnan mo ho mfi mʼakyi.
3.20: Nanso te sɛ ɔbea a onni ne kunu nokware no,saa ara na moanni me nokware, Israelfi,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
3.21: Wɔte osu bi wɔ nkoko no so,ɛyɛ Israelfo agyaadwotwa ne nkotosrɛ,efisɛ wɔakyeakyea wɔn akwanna wɔn werɛ afi Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn.
3.22: “Monsan mmra, ɔyera mma;mɛsa mo akyirisan yare no.”“Yiw, yɛbɛba wo nkyɛn,efisɛ wo ne Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn no.
3.23: Ampa, ahoni huuyɛ wɔ nkokone mmepɔw so no yɛ nnaadaa;nokware Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn muna Israel nkwagye wɔ.
3.24: Efi yɛn mmofraase, anyame huhuw adiyɛn agyanom nsa ano adwuma so aba,wɔn nguankuw ne anantwi,wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea.
3.25: Momma yɛmfa yɛn aniwu nneda famna yɛn ahohora nkata yɛn so.Yɛayɛ bɔne atia Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn,yɛn ne yɛn agyanom;efi yɛn mmofraase besi nnɛyɛanyɛ osetie amma Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn no.”

4.1: “Sɛ wo, Israel, wobɛsan wʼakyi a,san bra me nkyɛn,”sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Sɛ wuyi wʼahoni a ɛyɛ akyiwade fi mʼani sona sɛ woamman bio,
4.2: na sɛ wufi nokware, pɛpɛyɛ ne trenee muka ntam se, ‘Sɛ Awurade te ase yi,’ aafei wobehyira aman nona ne mu na wobenya anuonyam.”
4.3: Eyi ne asɛm a, Awurade ka kyerɛ Yuda mmarima ne Yerusalem:“Munsiesie mo asase a womfuntum da,na munnnua wɔ nsɔe mu.
4.4: Muntwitwa mo ho twetia mma Awurademuntwitwa mo koma twetia,mo Yuda mmarima ne Yerusalemfo,anyɛ saa a mʼabufuwhyew bɛsɔre na adɛw sɛ ogyamo bɔne a moayɛ nti,ɛbɛhyew a obiara rennum.”
4.5: Amanehunu A Efi Atifi Fam“Bɔ nkae wɔ Yuda na pae mu ka wɔ Yerusalem se‘Hyɛn torobɛnto no wɔ asase no nyinaa so!’Teɛ mu dennen se:‘Mommoaboa mo ho ano!Momma yenguan nkɔ nkuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu!’
4.6: Momma frankaa so na monkɔ Sionmunguan nkɔbɔ mo ho aguaa!Efisɛ mede amanehunu fi atifi fam reba,ɔsɛe a ɛyɛ hu.”
4.7: Gyata bi afi ne tu mu;ɔbɔɔaman bi asi mu.Wafi ne tenabeasɛ ɔrebɛsɛe wʼasase.Wo nkurow bebubuna ada mpan.
4.8: Enti fura atweaatam,di awerɛhow na twa adwo,efisɛ Awurade abufuwhyew nonnan mfii yɛn so.
4.9: “Saa da no,” Awurade na ose,“ɔhene no ne adwumayɛfo no bɛbɔ hu,asɔfo no bo betu,na adiyifo no ho bedwiriw wɔn.”
4.10: Afei, mekae se, “Aa, Otumfo Awurade, woadaadaa nnipa yi ne Yerusalem, wokae se, ‘Mubenya asomdwoe,’ wɔ bere a afoa da yɛn mene mu.”
4.11: Saa bere no wɔbɛka akyerɛ nnipa yi ne Yerusalem se, “Mframa a emu yɛ hyew bɛbɔ afi nkoko wosee a ɛwɔ nweatam so aba me nkurɔfo so, ɛnyɛ nea ɛpo ho anaa ehuhuw so;
4.12: mframa a ano yɛ den boro saa no fi me nkyɛn. Afei mepae mu ka mʼatemmu a etia wɔn.”
4.13: Hwɛ! ɔreba sɛ omununkum,ne nteaseɛnam reba sɛ mfɛtɛ,nʼapɔnkɔ ho yɛ hare sen akɔre.Yennue! Yɛawu!
4.14: Yerusalem, yi bɔne fi wo koma mu na woanya nkwa.Wode adwemmɔne bɛhyɛ wo mu akosi da bɛn?
4.15: Nne bi rebɔ amanneɛ fi Dan,ɛrebɔ amanehunu ho dawuru fi Efraim nkoko so.
4.16: “Monka eyi nkyerɛ aman no,mommɔ no dawuru nkyerɛ Yerusalem se,‘Atuafo dɔm fi akyirikyiri asase bi so reba,wɔma ɔko nteɛmu so de tia Yuda nkuropɔn.
4.17: Wotwa ne ho hyia sɛ mmarima a wɔrewɛn afuw,efisɛ watew me so atua,’ ”sɛɛ na Awurade se.
4.18: “Wo ankasa abrabɔ ne nneyɛe,na ɛde eyi aba wo so.Eyi yɛ wʼasotwe.Ɛyɛ nwen!Ɛwowɔ koma!”
4.19: Ao, mʼahoyeraw, mʼahoyeraw!midi me mu yaw.Me koma mu yawdi!Me koma bɔ kitirikitiri wɔ me mu,mintumi nyɛ komm.Efisɛ, mate torobɛnto no nnyigye;mate ɔko frɛ no.
4.20: Amanehunu di amanehunu akyi;asase no nyinaa asɛe.Wɔasɛe me ntamadan prɛko pɛ,ne me hintabea mpofirim.
4.21: Ɛsɛ sɛ mehwɛ ɔko frankaa nona mitie torobɛnto no nnyigye kosi da bɛn?
4.22: “Me nkurɔfo yɛ nkwaseafo;wonnim me.Wɔyɛ mma a wonni adwene;wɔnte hwee ase.Wɔwɔ bɔneyɛ ho nyansa;na wonnim sɛnea wɔyɛ papa.”
4.23: Mehwɛɛ asase no,na enni bɔbea, na ɛda mpan;mehwɛɛ ɔsorosoro, na wɔn hann no nni hɔ.
4.24: Mehwɛɛ mmepɔw no,na wɔrewosowosow,na nkoko no nyinaa rehinhim.
4.25: Mehwɛe, na nnipa nni hɔ;wim anomaa biara atu kɔ.
4.26: Mehwɛe, na nsasebere no adan nweatamna ne nkurow nyinaa asɛewɔ Awurade anim, wɔ nʼabufuwhyew ano.
4.27: Sɛnea Awurade se:“Wɔbɛsɛe asase no nyinaa;mmom, merensɛe no korakora.
4.28: Enti asase bedi awerɛhowna ɔsorosoro beduru sum,efisɛ makasa na merentwe nsan;masi gyinae na merennan no.”
4.29: Apɔnkɔsotefo ne agyantowfo nnyigyeima kurow biara sofo guan.Ebinom kɔhyɛ nkyɛkyerɛ mu,ebinom foro kɔ abotan mu.Nkurow no nyinaa so adeda mpan;na obiara nte so.
4.30: Dɛn na woreyɛ, wo a wɔasɛe wo?Adɛn na wufura ɔkɔbende sikakɔkɔɔ agude asiesie wo ho?Adɛn na wode nnuru keka wʼani?Wohyehyɛ wo ho kwa.Wʼadɔfo bu wo animtiaa;wɔrehwehwɛ wo akum wo.
4.31: Mete osu bi te sɛ ɔbea a ɔwɔ awoko mu,apinisi te sɛ ɔbea a ɔrewo nʼabakan,Ɔbabea Sion resu te sɛ nea osi apini,ɔtrɛw ne nsa mu na ɔreka se,“Afei de meretɔ piti;wɔde me nkwa ama awudifo.”

5.1: Obiara Nyɛ Ɔtreneeni“Munni akɔneaba wɔ Yerusalem mmɔnten so,monhwɛ mo ho nhyia nhwɛ,monhwehwɛ guabɔbea nyinaa.Sɛ muhu onipa baako mpo aɔyɛ pɛ na odi nokware a,mede kuropɔn yi ho bɛkyɛ no.
5.2: Ɛwɔ mu wɔka se, ‘Sɛ Awurade te ase yi,’nanso wɔda so ka ntam hunu.”
5.3: Awurade, wʼani mpɛ nokware ahu ana?Wobɔɔ wɔn hwee fam, nanso wɔante yaw biara;wodwerɛw wɔn, nanso wɔpoo nteɛso.Wɔyɛɛ wɔn anim dennen sen ɔbona wɔansakra wɔn adwene.
5.4: Misusuw se, “Eyinom nko ara ne ahiafo no;wɔyɛ nkwaseafo nso,efisɛ wonnim Awurade akwan,nea wɔn Nyankopɔn hwehwɛ.
5.5: Enti mɛkɔ ntuanofo no nkyɛnakɔkasa akyerɛ wɔn;ampa ara wonim Awurade akwannea wɔn Onyankopɔn hwehwɛ.”Nanso wɔn nso de adwene koro abubu konnua noatetew nkyehama no mu.
5.6: Ɛno nti gyata bi a ofi kwae mu bɛtow ahyɛ wɔn so,pataku bi a ofi nweatam so bɛtetew wɔn mu.Ɔsebɔ bi bɛtɛw abɛn wɔn nkurow,na obiara a obeyi ne ti no ɔbɛtetew ne mu nketenkete,efisɛ wɔn atuatew no ano yɛ denna wɔn akyirisan aboro so.
5.7: “Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mede mo ho kyɛ mo?Mo mma apo me,wɔde anyame a wɔnyɛ anyame aka ntam.Memaa wɔn nea wohia nyinaa,nanso wɔbɔɔ aguamanna wɔbɔɔ yuu kɔɔ nguamanfo afi mu.
5.8: Mpɔnkɔnini aniberefo a wɔhwɛ wɔn yiye,wɔn mu biara su di ne yɔnko yere akyi.
5.9: Ɛnsɛ sɛ metwe wɔn aso wɔ eyi ho?”Sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Ɛnsɛ sɛ, mʼankasa metɔɔman a ɛte sɛɛ so were ana?
5.10: “Momfa ne bobe nturo no mu na monsɛe no,nanso monnsɛe no koraa.Mompempan ne mman no,efisɛ saa nnipa yi nyɛ Awurade dea.
5.11: Israelfi ne Yudafianni me nokware koraa,”Awurade na ose.
5.12: Wɔadi atoro afa Awurade ho,wɔkae se, “Ɔrenyɛ hwee!Ɔhaw biara remma yɛn so;yɛrenhu afoa anaa ɔkɔm da.
5.13: Adiyifo no yɛ mframa bi kɛkɛna asɛm no nte wɔn mu;enti momma nea wɔka no mmra wɔn so.”
5.14: Enti eyi ne nea Asafo Awurade, Nyankopɔn se:“Esiane sɛ, nnipa no aka saa nsɛm yi nti,mɛyɛ me nsɛm a ɛwɔ wʼanom no ogyana saa nnipa yi ayɛ nnyina a ogya no bɛhyew.
5.15: Israelfi,” Awurade na ose,“Mede ɔman bi a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri rebetia wo,tete man a ɛyɛ ɔmantease,nnipa a munnim wɔn kasa,na monnte wɔn kasa ase.
5.16: Wɔn agyan mmɔtɔwa te sɛ ɔda a ano da hɔ;wɔn nyinaa yɛ dɔmmarima.
5.17: Wɔbɛsɛe mo nnɔbae ne mo nnuan,asɛe mo mmabarima ne mo mmabea;wɔbɛsɛe mo nguankuw ne mo anantwikuw,asɛe mo bobe ne mo mmrɔdɔma.Wɔde afoa bɛsɛenkuropɔn a ɛwɔ bammɔ a mode mo werɛ ahyɛ mu no.
5.18: “Afei saa nna no mu mpo,” sɛɛ na Awurade se, “Merensɛe mo korakora.
5.19: Na sɛ nnipa no bisa se, ‘Adɛn nti na Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn, ayɛ yɛn sɛɛ’ a, mobɛka akyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Sɛnea moagyaw me hɔ akɔsom ananafo anyame wɔ mo ankasa mo asase so no, saa ara na mprempren mobɛsom ananafo wɔ asase a ɛnyɛ mo dea no so.’
5.20: “Monka eyi nkyerɛ Yakobfina mo mpae mu nka wɔ Yuda se:
5.21: Muntie, mo nkwaseafo ne nnipa a munni adwene,mowɔ ani nso munhu ade,na mowɔ aso nso monte asɛm:
5.22: Ɛnsɛ sɛ musuro me ana?” Sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Ɛnsɛ sɛ mo ho popo wɔ mʼanim ana?Mede nwea ato ɔhye ama po,ɔhye a ɛwɔ hɔ daa a ɛrentumi ntra.Asorɔkye bɛbɔ nanso ɛrentumi mmu mfa so;ebehuru so nanso ɛrentumi ntra.
5.23: Nanso saa nnipa yi wɔ asoɔden ne atuatew koma;wɔatwe wɔn ho afi me ho kɔ.
5.24: Wɔnnka nkyerɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho se,‘Momma yensuro Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn,a ɔma osu tɔ wɔ ne mmere mu,nea ɔma yɛn awerehyɛmu wɔ otwabere nnapɛn a wahyɛ no ho.’
5.25: Mo amumɔyɛ abɔ eyinom agu;mo bɔne ama ade pa abɔ mo.
5.26: “Amumɔyɛfo bi wɔ me nkurɔfo yi mua wɔtɛw sɛ nnipa a wosum nnomaa afiri,na wɔte sɛ wɔn a wosum mfiri yi nnipa.
5.27: Sɛnea nnomaa ahyɛ kɛntɛn ma nosaa ara na asisi ahyɛ wɔn afi amaama;wɔayeyɛ adefo anyinya tumi,
5.28: na wɔadodɔ srade ama wɔn ho ayɛ hanahana.Wɔn amumɔyɛsɛm no nni awiei;wɔnnka ayisaa asɛm mma wonni bem,na wɔmmɔ ahiafo tumi ho ban.
5.29: Ɛnsɛ sɛ metwe wɔn aso wɔ eyinom ho ana?”Sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Ɛnsɛ sɛ, mʼankasa metɔɔman a ɛte sɛɛ so were ana?
5.30: “Ade a ɛyɛ hu ne ahodwiriwasi wɔ asase no so:
5.31: Adiyifo no hyɛ akɔntoro,asɔfo no de wɔn dibea di tumi,na me nkurɔfo no pɛ no saa ara.Nanso awiei no dɛn na wobɛyɛ?”

6.1: Atamfo Atwa Yerusalem Ho Ahyia“Benyaminfo, munguan nkɔbɔ mo ho aguaa!Munguan mfi Yerusalem!Monhyɛn torobɛnto no wɔ Tekoa!Munsi frankaa no wɔ Bet-Hakerem!Efisɛ amanehunu bobɔw fi atifi fam,ɔsɛe bi a ɛyɛ hu.
6.3: Nguanhwɛfo ne wɔn nguankuw bɛba abetia no;wobesisi wɔn ntamadan atwa ne ho ahyia,wɔn mu biara bɛhwɛ ne kyɛfa so.”
6.4: “Munsiesie mo ho ne no nkɔko!Monsɔre, momma yɛnkɔtow nhyɛ ne so owigyinae!Nanso hwɛ, onwini redwo,na anwummere sunsuma reware.
6.5: Enti monsɔre, momma yɛnkɔtow nhyɛ ne so anadwona yɛnsɛe nʼaban ahorow!”
6.6: Nea Asafo Awurade se ni:“Muntwitwa nnua no ngu famna muntwa Yerusalem ho dantaban.Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtwe kuropɔn yi aso;nhyɛso ahyɛ no ma.
6.7: Sɛnea abura puw ne nsu no,saa ara na opuw nʼamumɔyɛ.Wɔte awurukasɛm ne ɔsɛe nka wɔ ne mu;ne yare ne nʼapirakuru wɔ mʼanim daa.
6.8: Fa kɔkɔbɔ, Yerusalem,anyɛ saa metwe me ho afi wo hona mama wʼasase ada mpana obiara ntumi ntena so.”
6.9: Nea Asafo Awurade se ni:“Ma wonyiyi Israel nkae no mu yiyesɛnea woyiyi bobe mu yiye no;fa wo nsa fa mman no so bio,sɛ obi a ɔretetew bobe aba.”
6.10: Hena na metumi akasa akyerɛ no na mabɔ no kɔkɔ?Hena na obetie me?Wɔn aso asisiwenti wɔnte asɛm.Awurade asɛm yɛ akyiwade ma wɔn,na wɔn ani nnye ho.
6.11: Nanso Awurade abufuwhyew ahyɛ me ma,na mintumi nkora so.“Hwie gu mmofra a wɔwɔ mmɔnten sone mmerante a wɔahyia;ɛbɛka okunu ne ɔyere,mmasiriwa, wɔn a onyin ahunhuan wɔn no so.
6.12: Wɔbɛdan wɔn afi ama afoforo,wɔn mfuw ne wɔn yerenom bɛka ho;sɛ meteɛ me nsawɔ wɔn a wɔte asase no so a,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
6.13: “Efi akumaa so kosi ɔkɛse so,wɔn nyinaa yɛ adifudepɛfo de pɛ ahonya;adiyifo ne asɔfo te saa,wɔn nyinaa yɛ asisifo.
6.14: Wɔtoto me nkurɔfo apirakurute sɛnea ɛnyɛ hu.Wɔka se, ‘Asomdwoe, asomdwoe’wɔ mmere a asomdwoe nni hɔ.
6.15: Wɔn ani wu wɔ wɔn animguase nneyɛe no ho ana?Dabi da, wɔn ani nnwu koraa;wonnim fɛre mpo.Enti wɔbɛtotɔ wɔ atɔfo mu;wɔbɛhwehwe ase, sɛ metwe wɔn aso a,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
6.16: Eyi ne nea Awurade se,“Munnyina nkwantanan no so na monhwɛ;mummisa tete akwan no,mummisa faako a ɔkwan pa no da na monnantew so,na mubenya home ama mo akra.Nanso mokae se, ‘yɛnnantew so.’
6.17: Mede awɛmfo sisii mo so na mekae se,‘Muntie torobɛnto nnyigyei no!’Nanso mokae se, ‘Yɛrentie.’
6.18: Ɛno nti monyɛ aso, mo amanaman;mo a moyɛ nnansefo, monhwɛ,monhwɛ nea ɛbɛto wɔn.
6.19: Tie, wo asase:Mede amanehunu reba saa nnipa yi so,wɔn nneyɛe so aba,efisɛ wɔantie me nsɛmna wɔapo me mmara.
6.20: Nnuhuam a efi Sebaanaa ahwerew pa a efi akyirikyiri asase so fa me ho bɛn?Minnye wo hyew afɔre no nto mu,wʼafɔrebɔ ahorow no nsɔ mʼani.”
6.21: Ɛno nti, nea Awurade se ni:“Mede akwanside begu saa nkurɔfo yi anim.Agyanom ne mmabarima nyinaa behintiw wɔ so;yɔnkonom ne nnamfonom bɛyera.”
6.22: Sɛnea Awurade se ni:“Monhwɛ, nsraadɔm bi reba,wofi atifi fam asase so;wɔrehwanyan wɔnafi nsase ano.
6.23: Wokurakura bɛmma ne mpeaw;wɔn tirim yɛ den, na wonni ahummɔbɔ.Wɔn nnyigyei te sɛ po asorɔkye.Sɛ wɔtete wɔn apɔnkɔ so a,wɔba te sɛ mmarima a wɔrekɔ ɔko.Wɔrebɛtow ahyɛ wo so, Ɔbabea Sion.”
6.24: Yɛate wɔn ho nsɛm,na yɛn nsa sesa yɛn ho sɛ nea awuwu.Awerɛhow akyekyere yɛnyɛte yaw sɛ ɔbea a ɔreko awo.
6.25: Mfi adi nkɔ wuramna nnantew akwan no so,efisɛ ɔtamfo no wɔ afoa,na baabiara ayɛ hu.
6.26: Me nkurɔfo, mumfura atweaatamna mommunummunum wɔ nsõ mu,momfa adwadwotwa yaayaw nni awerɛhowsɛnea wosu ma ɔbabarima koro,efisɛ ɔsɛefo nobɛba yɛn so mpofirim.
6.27: “Mayɛ wo obi a ɔsɔ agude hwɛna me nkurɔfo dadeben,a wobɛhwɛna woasɔ wɔn akwan ahwɛ.
6.28: Wɔn nyinaa yɛ atuatewfo a wɔyɛ den,wɔnenam di nseku.Wɔyɛ kɔbere ne dade;wɔn nyinaa yɛ wɔn ade wɔ porɔwee kwan so.
6.29: Afa no bɔ mframa dennende ogya nan sumpii no,nanso ɔnan no yɛ ɔkwa.Entumi nyiyii bɔne no mfii wɔn mu ɛ.
6.30: Wɔfrɛ wɔn dwetɛ a wɔapo,efisɛ Awurade apo wɔn.”

7.1: Atoro Nyamesom So Nni MfasoEyi ne asɛm a efi Awurade hɔ baa Yeremia nkyɛn:
7.2: “Gyina Awurade asɔredan no pon ano, na ka saa asɛm yi:“ ‘Muntie Awurade asɛm, mo nnipa a mowɔ Yuda nyinaa a mofa apon yi ano kɔsom Awurade.
7.3: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn no se: Monsakra mo akwan ne mo nneyɛe, na mɛma mo atena ha.
7.4: Mommfa mo ho nto nnaadaasɛm so na monnka se, “Eyi ne Awurade asɔredan, Awurade asɔredan, Awurade asɔredan!”
7.5: Sɛ mosakra mo akwan ne mo nneyɛe nokware mu, na mo ne mo ho mo ho di no trenee mu,
7.6: sɛ moanhyɛ ɔhɔho, ayisaa anaa okunafo so, na moanhwie mogya a edi bem angu wɔ ha, na moanni anyame foforo akyi ankɔ mo ara ɔsɛe mu a,
7.7: ɛno de, mɛma mo atena ha, asase a mede maa mo agyanom afebɔɔ no so.
7.8: Nanso monhwɛ, mode mo ho ato nnaadaa nsɛm a so nni mfaso so.
7.9: “ ‘Mobɛbɔ korɔn na moadi awu, mobɛbɔ aguaman na moadi adansekurum, mobɛhyew nnuhuam ama Baal na moadi anyame afoforo a munnim wɔn akyi,
7.10: na afei, moaba abegyina mʼanim wɔ ofi a me din da so na moaka se, “Yenni ɔhaw,” sɛ moyɛ akyiwade yi nyinaa a na munni ɔhaw ana?
7.11: Na ofi a me din da so yi, abɛyɛ adwowtwafo tu ama mo ana? Nanso migu so rehwɛ! Awurade na ose.
7.12: “ ‘Na afei monkɔ Silo, faako a midii kan bɔɔ atenae de me Din too so, na monhwɛ nea meyɛɛ no esiane me nkurɔfo Israelfo amumɔyɛ nti.
7.13: Bere a moreyɛ eyinom nyinaa, Awurade na ose, mekasa kyerɛɛ mo mpɛn bebree, nanso moantie; mefrɛɛ mo, nanso moannye so.
7.14: Ɛno nti, sɛnea meyɛɛ Silo no, mede bɛyɛ ofi a me Din da so no, asɔredan a mode mo ho to so, baabi a mede maa mo ne mo agyanom no.
7.15: Mɛpam mo afi mʼanim sɛnea meyɛɛ mo nuanom Efraimfo no.’
7.16: “Enti mommmɔ mpae mma saa nnipa yi, monnsrɛ na munni mma wɔn nso; monnsrɛ me, efisɛ merentie mo.
7.17: Munnhu nea wɔreyɛ wɔ Yuda nkurow no mu ne Yerusalem mmɔnten so no ana?
7.18: Mmofra boaboa nnyina ano, na agyanom sɔ ogya no ano, mmea fɔtɔw asikresiam de to brodo ma Ɔsoro Hemmea. Na wogu nsa ma anyame afoforo de hyɛ me abufuw.
7.19: Na ɛyɛ me na wɔrehyɛ me abufuw ana? Awurade na ose. Na ɛnyɛ wɔn mmom na wɔrehaw wɔn ho, hyɛ wɔn ho aniwu ana?
7.20: “ ‘Ɛno nti, nea Otumfo Awurade se ni: Wobehwie mʼabufuw ne mʼabufuwhyew agu beae yi so, agu nnipa ne mmoa, mfuw so nnua ne asase no so aba so, na ɛbɛdɛw a ɛrennum.’
7.21: “ ‘Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, se: Monkɔ so, momfa mo ɔhyew afɔrebɔ nka mo afɔrebɔ a aka no ho, na mo ankasa monwe nam no!
7.22: Na bere a miyii mo agyanom fii Misraim na mekasa kyerɛɛ wɔn no, manhyɛ wɔn mmara a ɛfa ɔhyew afɔrebɔ ne afɔrebɔ ho nko ara,
7.23: mmom mede saa mmara yi kaa ho: Monyɛ osetie mma me, na mɛyɛ mo Nyankopɔn, na moayɛ me nkurɔfo. Monnantew akwan nyinaa a mɛhyɛ mo no so, na asi mo yiye.
7.24: Nanso wɔantie na wɔanyɛ aso; mmom, wofi wɔn koma bɔne mu yɛɛ asoɔden. Wɔsan wɔn akyi na wɔankɔ wɔn anim.
7.25: Efi bere a mo agyanom fii Misraim de besi nnɛ yi, da biara ne bere biara mesomaa me nkoa adiyifo baa mo nkyɛn.
7.26: Nanso wɔantie me na wɔanyɛ aso. Wɔde asoɔden yɛɛ bɔne boroo wɔn agyanom de so.’
7.27: “Sɛ moka eyinom nyinaa kyerɛ wɔn a, wɔrentie mo; sɛ mofrɛ wɔn a wɔrennye so.
7.28: Ɛno nti monka nkyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Eyi ne ɔman a ɔnyɛɛ osetie mmaa Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn, na ɔmfaa nteɛso no. Nokware asa, na afi wɔn ano.
7.29: Munyi mo tinwi na montow ngu, muntwa agyaadwo wɔ nkoko no so, efisɛ Awurade apo, na wagyaa saa awo ntoatoaso yi a wɔwɔ nʼabufuwhyew no ase akyidi.’ ”
7.30: Okum Bon No“ ‘Yudafo ayɛ bɔne wɔ mʼani so, sɛnea Awurade se ni. Wɔde ahoni a, ɛyɛ akyiwade asisi ofi a me Din da so mu de agu ho fi.
7.31: Wɔasisi Tofet sorɔnsorɔmmea wɔ Ben Hinom bon mu; ɛhɔ na wɔhyew wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea. Ade a manhyɛ wɔn na amma mʼadwene mu nso.
7.32: Ɛno nti, monhwɛ yiye na nna no reba, Awurade na ose, a wɔremfrɛ hɔ Tofet anaa Hinom Bon bio, na mmom, wɔbɛfrɛ no Okum Bon, efisɛ wobesie awufo wɔ Tofet kosi sɛ hɔ bɛyɛ ma.
7.33: Na afei saa nnipa yi afunu bɛyɛ aduan ama wim nnomaa ne asase so mmoa, na ɛrenka obiara wɔ hɔ a ɔbɛpam wɔn.
7.34: Mede ahosɛpɛw ne anigye nnyigyei, ayeforo ne ayeforokunu nne a ɛwɔ Yuda nkurow ne Yerusalem mmɔnten so no bɛba awiei, efisɛ asase no bɛda mpan.’ ”

8.1: “ ‘Saa bere no, sɛnea Awurade se ni, wobeyiyi Yuda ahemfo ne adwumayɛfo nnompe, asɔfo ne adiyifo nnompe ne Yerusalemfo nnompe afi wɔn nna mu.
8.2: Wɔbɛsɛw no kɛtɛ wɔ owia ne ɔsram ne ɔsorosoro nsoromma nyinaa a wɔdɔe, na wɔsomee, na wodii akyi kɔɔ so abisa na wɔsɔree no ase. Wɔremmoa wɔn ano na wɔrensie wɔn; mmom, wɔbɛyɛ sɛ sumina a egugu fam.
8.3: Baabiara a metwa saa ɔman bɔne yi nkae no asu akɔ no, wɔbɛpɛ sɛ wobewu sen sɛ wɔbɛtena nkwa mu, sɛnea Asafo Awurade se ni.’
8.4: Bɔne Ne Asotwe“Ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Nea Awurade se ni:“ ‘Sɛ nnipa hwe ase a, wɔnsɔre ana?Sɛ onipa dan ne ho a, ɔnsan nʼakyi ana?
8.5: Afei adɛn nti na saa nnipa yi adan wɔn ho?Adɛn nti na Yerusalem dan ne ho daa yi?Wokura nnaadaa mu pintinn;na wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔsan wɔn akyi.
8.6: Mawɛn mʼaso atie,nanso wɔnnka nea ɛteɛ.Wɔn mu biara nnu ne ho wɔ nʼamumɔyɛ ho,na ɔka se, “Dɛn na mayɛ?”Obiara fa ne kwante sɛ ɔpɔnkɔ a ɔrepem akɔ akono.
8.7: Mpo aturukuku a ɔwɔ wimnim ne mmere a wɔahyehyɛ ama no,na asukɔnkɔn, asomfena ne agyenkukuhu bere a wotu kɔtena baabi,nanso me nkurɔfo nnimnea Awurade hwehwɛ.
8.8: “ ‘Adɛn na mutumi ka se, “Yenim nyansa,efisɛ yɛwɔ Awurade mmara,”wɔ bere a akyerɛwfo kyerɛwdua torofode atoro adannan mu?
8.9: Anyansafo no anim begu ase;wɔn ho bedwiriw wɔn na afide ayi wɔn.Sɛ wɔapo Awurade asɛm no a,na nyansa bɛn na wɔwɔ?
8.10: Mede wɔn yerenom bɛma mmarima afoforone wɔn mfuw nso ama afoforo.Efi akumaa so kosi ɔkɛse so,wɔn nyinaa yɛ adifudepɛfo de pɛ ahonya;adiyifo ne asɔfo te saa,wɔn nyinaa yɛ asisifo.
8.11: Wɔtoto me nkurɔfo apirakurute sɛnea ɛnyɛ hu.Wɔka se, “Asomdwoe, asomdwoe”wɔ mmere a asomdwoe nni hɔ.
8.12: Wɔn ani wu wɔ wɔn animguase nneyɛe no ho ana?Dabi da, wɔn ani nnwu koraa;wonnim fɛre mpo.Enti wɔbɛtotɔ wɔ atɔfo mu;wɔbɛhwehwe ase, sɛ metwe wɔn aso a,sɛnea Awurade se ni.
8.13: “ ‘Mɛfa wɔn twabere nnɔbae akɔ,nea Awurade se ni.Aba biara remma bobe nnua no so.Aba biara remma borɔdɔma nnua no so,ɛso nhaban begunguan.Nea mede ama wɔn no,wobegye afi wɔn nsam.’ ”
8.14: Adɛn nti na yɛtete ha?Mommoaboa mo ho ano!Momma yenguan nkɔ nkuropɔn a ɛwɔ bammɔ muna yenkowuwu wɔ hɔ!efisɛ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn abu yɛn kumfɔna wama yɛn nsu a awuduru wɔ mu sɛ yɛnnom,efisɛ yɛayɛ bɔne atia no.
8.15: Yɛhwɛɛ kwan sɛ yebenya asomdwoenanso biribi pa biara amfi mu amma,yɛhwɛɛ ayaresabere kwannanso ehu nko ara na ɛkaa yɛn.
8.16: Wɔte atamfo no apɔnkɔ homefii Dan;na wɔn apɔnkɔnini suma asase no nyinaa wosow.Wɔaba sɛ wɔrebɛsɛeasase no ne so nneɛma nyinaa,kuropɔn no ne wɔn a wɔtete mu nyinaa.
8.17: “Hwɛ, mɛsoma awɔ a wɔn ano wɔ bɔre aba mo mu,nhurutoa a wontumi nnwudwo wɔn,na wɔbɛkeka mo,”nea Awurade se ni.
8.18: Wone mʼawerɛhow mu Werɛkyekyefo,me koma abotow wɔ me mu.
8.19: Tie me nkurɔfo sufrɛ;a efi akyirikyiri asase so:“Awurade nni Sion ana?Ne Hene no nni hɔ bio ana?”“Adɛn nti na wɔde wɔn nsɛsode ahyɛ me abufuw,wɔn ananafo ahoni huhuw no?”
8.20: “Otwabere no atwa mu,ahuhuru bere no aba awiei,na wonnnyee yɛn nkwa.”
8.21: Sɛ wɔadwerɛw me nkurɔfo no nti, wɔadwerɛw me;midi awerɛhow, na ahodwiriw akyekyere me.
8.22: Aduru bi nni Gilead ana?Ɔyaresafo bi nni hɔ ana?Na afei adɛn nti na ayaresa nni hɔmma me nkurɔfo apirakuru?

9.1: Ao, sɛ me ti yɛ asuti,na mʼaniwa yɛ nusu abura a!Mɛtew nusu awia ne anadwoama me nkurɔfo a wɔakunkum wɔn no.
9.2: Ao, sɛ mewɔ akwantufo asoɛewɔ nweatam no so aanka megyaw me nkurɔfo hɔna mafi wɔn nkyɛn;efisɛ wɔn nyinaa yɛ nguaman,nnipakuw a wonni nokware.
9.3: “Wosiesie wɔn tɛkrɛmate sɛ agyan de di atoro;Ɛnyɛ nokware so na wɔnamdi yiye wɔ asase yi so.Wɔyɛ bɔne toatoa so;na wonnye me nto mu,”Awurade na ose.
9.4: “Monhwɛ yiye wɔ mo nnamfonom ho;munnye obiara nni wɔ mo abusua mu.Efisɛ wɔn mu biara yɛ ɔdaadaafo,na adamfo biara yɛ ɔsɛefo.
9.5: Adamfo daadaa adamfo,na wɔn mu biara nka nokware.Wɔn tɛkrɛma akokwaw atorodi mu,wɔde bɔneyɛ haw wɔn ho.
9.6: Wote nnaadaa mfimfini;na wɔn nnaadaa mu wɔmpɛ sɛ wogye me to mu,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
9.7: Ɛno nti, sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se,“Hwɛ, mɛnan wɔn asɔ wɔn ahwɛ,na dɛn bio na metumi ayɛesiane me nkurɔfo yi bɔne nti?
9.8: Wɔn tɛkrɛma yɛ agyan a ano wɔ bɔre;ɛka nnaadaasɛm.Obiara kasa asomdwoe mu kyerɛ ne yɔnko,nanso ne koma mu de, osum no afiri.
9.9: Ɛnsɛ sɛ metwe wɔn aso wɔ eyi ho?”Sɛɛ na Awurade se.“Ɛnsɛ sɛ mʼankasa metɔɔman a ɛte sɛɛ so were ana?
9.10: Mesu na metwa adwo ama mmepɔw no,mɛbɔ abubuw a ɛfa nweatam adidibea ho.Ayɛ fo na obi mfa hɔ bio,na wɔnte anantwi su wɔ hɔ.Wim nnomaa no atutu kɔna mmoa no nso aguan kɔ.
9.11: “Mɛyɛ Yerusalem mmubui siw,sakraman atu;na mɛma Yuda nkurow ada mpansɛnea obiara ntumi ntena hɔ.”
9.13: Awurade kae se, “Esiane sɛ wɔapo me mmara a mehyɛ maa wɔn no nti, wɔanyɛ osetie amma me na wɔanni me mmara so.
9.14: Mmom, wɔadi wɔn koma asoɔden akyi, wɔadi Baalnom akyi sɛnea wɔn agyanom kyerɛɛ wɔn no.”
9.15: Ɛno nti, nea Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn no se ni: “Hwɛ, mɛma saa nnipa yi adi aduan a ɛyɛ nwen na wɔanom nsu a wɔde awuduru afra.
9.16: Mɛbɔ wɔn ahwete amanaman a wɔn anaa wɔn agyanom nnim so no so, na mede afoa bɛtaa wɔn kosi sɛ mɛsɛe wɔn.”
9.17: Sɛnea Awurade tumfo se ni:“Dwene ho! Frɛ mmea agyaadwotwafo no,frɛ wɔn a wɔakwadaw mu pa ara.
9.18: Ma wɔmmra ntɛmmmesu ngu yɛn sokosi sɛ yɛn ani so bɛtaa nusuna nusu aguare yɛn.
9.19: Wɔte agyaadwotwa nnyigyei fi Sion se,‘Wɔasɛe yɛn!Yɛn anim agu ase yiye!Ɛsɛ sɛ yetu fi yɛn asase soefisɛ yɛn afi abubu.’ ”
9.20: Afei, mo mmea, muntie Awurade asɛm;monyɛ aso mma nsɛm a efi nʼanom.Monkyerɛ mo mmabea sɛnea wotwa dwo;monkyerɛ mo ho mo ho abubuwbɔ.
9.21: Owu aforo afa yɛn mfɛnsere muahyɛn yɛn aban mu;apam mmofra afi mmɔnten sone mmerante afi ɔman aguabɔbea.
9.22: Ka se, “Sɛɛ Na Awurade se,“ ‘Nnipa afunu bɛdeda hɔte sɛ sumina a egugu petee mu,te sɛ aburow a nnɔbaetwafo atwa agu nʼakyia obiara mmoaboaa ano.’ ”
9.23: Eyi ne nea Awurade se:“Mma onyansafo mfa ne nyansa nhyehyɛ ne hoanaa ɔhoɔdenfo mfa nʼahoɔden nhyehyɛ ne hoanaa ɔdefo mfa nʼahonya nhyehyɛ ne ho.
9.24: Mmom ma nea ɔhyehyɛ ne ho nhyehyɛ ne ho sɛɔwɔ nhumu, na onim sɛ,me ne Awurade a ɔyɛ adɔe,na obu atɛntrenee na ɔyɛ adetrenee wɔ asase so,efisɛ eyinom na ɛsɔ mʼani,”sɛnea Awurade se ni.
9.12: Onipa bɛn na onim nyansa ara sɛ ɔbɛte eyi ase? Hena na Awurade akyerɛkyerɛ no a obetumi akyerɛ ase? Adɛn nti na wɔasɛe asase no ama ada mpan sɛ nweatam a obiara ntumi mfa so?
9.25: “Nna no reba,” Awurade na ose, “A mɛtwe wɔn a wɔatwa twetia wɔ honam fam nko ara no nyinaa aso:
9.26: Misraimfo, Yudafo, Edomfo, Amonfo, Moabfo ne wɔn a wɔtete nweatam a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri nsase so nyinaa. Na nokware, saa aman yi nyinaa yɛ momonotofo na mpo Israelfi nyinaa yɛ koma mu momonotofo.”

10.1: Onyankopɔn Ne AhoniMuntie nea Awurade ka kyerɛ mo, Israelfi.
10.2: Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Munnsua amanaman no akwananaa momma wim nsɛnkyerɛnne mmɔ mo hu,ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔbɔ amanaman no hu.
10.3: Na nkurɔfo no amanne nka hwee;wotwa dua fi kwae mu,na odwumfo de ne fitii asen.
10.4: Wɔde dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ hyehyɛ no;wɔde nnadewa ne asae bobɔ si hɔsɛnea ɛrenhwe fam.
10.5: Ɛte sɛ kaakaabotoni a esi ɛfere mfikyifuw mu,wɔn ahoni no ntumi nkasa;ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsoa wɔnefisɛ wontumi nnantew.Munnsuro wɔn;wɔrentumi nhaw mona wɔrentumi nyɛ ade pa biara nso.”
10.6: Obiara nte sɛ wo, Awurade;woyɛ ɔkɛsena wo din so wɔ tumi mu.
10.7: Hena na ɛnsɛ sɛ odi wo ni,Amansanhene?Eyi na ɛfata wo.Amanaman no so anyansafo nyinaa mune wɔn ahenni nyinaa mu,obiara ne wo nsɛ.
10.8: Wɔn nyinaa yɛ adwenharefo ne nkwaseafo;dua ahoni a so nni mfaso na ɛma wɔn nkyerɛkyerɛ.
10.9: Wɔde dwetɛ a wɔaboro fi Tarsis ba,ne sikakɔkɔɔ nso fi Ufas ba.Ɛyɛ nea odwumfo ne sika dwumfo ayɛa wɔde ntama bibiri ne beredum afura no,ne nyinaa yɛ adwumfo anyansafo nsa ano nnwuma.
10.10: Nanso Awurade ne nokware Onyankopɔn no;ɔno ne Onyankopɔn teasefo, daapem Hene no.Sɛ ne bo fuw a asase wosow;na amanaman no ntumi nnyina nʼabufuwhyew ano.
10.11: “Ka eyi kyerɛ wɔn: ‘Saa anyame a ɛnyɛ wɔn na wɔyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase no bɛyera afi asase so ne ɔsorosoro ase.’ ”
10.12: Nanso Onyankopɔn de ne tumi bɔɔ asase;ɔtoo wiase fapem wɔ ne nyansa mu,na ɔde ne nhumu trɛw ɔsorosoro mu.
10.13: Sɛ ɔpaapae aprannaa a ɔsorosoro nsu bobɔ mu;ɔma omununkum ma ne ho so fi nsase ano.Ɔde anyinam ka osu ho ba,na ogyaa mframa mu fi nʼadekoradan mu.
10.14: Onipa biara nnim nyansa, na onni nimdeɛ;sikadwumfo biara anim gu ase, esiane nʼahoni nti.Ne nsɛsode yɛ atoro;wonni ɔhome biara wɔ wɔn mu.
10.15: Wɔn so nni mfaso, wɔn ho yɛ serew;sɛ wɔn atemmu du so a, wɔbɛyera.
10.16: Nea ɔyɛ Yakob Kyɛfa no nte sɛ eyinom,efisɛ ɔno ne ade nyinaa Yɛfoa Israel, abusua a ɛyɛ nʼagyapade nso ka ho,Asafo Awurade ne ne din.
10.17: Ɔsɛe A ƐrebaMommoaboa mo ahode ano mfi asase no so,mo a motete nkurow a wɔatua wɔn ano mu.
10.18: Na sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Saa bere yi mɛtow wɔn awɔtete asase yi so agu;mede amanehunu bɛba wɔn sosɛnea wɔbɛfa wɔn nnommum.”
10.19: Me pira yi nti minnue,mʼapirakuru yɛ akisikuru!Nanso mehyɛɛ me ho den sɛ,“Eyi ne me yare, na ɛsɛ sɛ mimia mʼani.”
10.20: Wɔasɛe me ntamadan;wɔatwitwa nʼahama nyinaa mu.Wɔafa me mma nyinaa kɔ a merenhu wɔn bio;anka obiara a obesi me ntamadananaa obesiesie me suhyɛ.
10.21: Nguanhwɛfo no yɛ adwenharefowommisa Awurade akyi kwan;ɛno nti wɔnkɔ sona wɔn nguankuw no abɔ ahwete.
10.22: Muntie! Amanneɛ no reba,basabasayɛ kɛse a efi atifi fam asase bi so!Ɛbɛma Yuda nkurow ada mpan,na ayɛ sakraman atu.
10.23: Yeremia MpaebɔAwurade, minim sɛ, onipa nkwa nyɛ ne de;na ɛnyɛ onipa na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ nʼanammɔntu.
10.24: Teɛ me so, Awurade, wɔ trenee mu,mfi wʼabufuw mu nyɛ;anyɛ saa a wobɛdwerɛw me.
10.25: Hwie wʼabufuwhyew no gu amanamana wonnye wo nto mu no so,nnipa a wɔmmɔ wo din no so.Efisɛ, wɔasɛe Yakobwɔasɛe no koraana wɔasɛe nʼasase a wɔwoo no too so no.

11.1: Wɔabu Apam No SoAsɛm a efi Awurade hɔ baa Yeremia nkyɛn ni:
11.2: “Tie apam yi mu nhyehyɛe na ka kyerɛ Yudafo ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem.
11.3: Ka kyerɛ wɔn se, sɛɛ na Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se: ‘Nnome nka onipa a onni apam yi mu nhyehyɛe so,
11.4: nea mehyɛ maa mo agyanom bere a miyii wɔn fii Misraim, fononoo a wɔnan dade wɔ mu no.’ Mekae se, ‘Monyɛ osetie mma me na monyɛ biribiara a mehyɛ mo, na mobɛyɛ me nkurɔfo na mayɛ mo Nyankopɔn.
11.5: Na afei mɛma ntam a mekaa mo agyanom se, mɛma wɔn asase a nufusu ne ɛwo sen wɔ so no aba mu,’ asase a mote so nnɛ yi.”Mibuae se, “Amen, Awurade.”
11.6: Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Bɔ saa asɛm yi ho dawuru wɔ Yuda nkurow ne Yerusalem mmɔnten so se: ‘Muntie apam yi ho nhyehyɛe na munni so.
11.7: Efi bere a miyii mo agyanom fii Misraim besi nnɛ yi, mebɔɔ wɔn kɔkɔ bere biara se, “Monyɛ osetie mma me.”
11.8: Nanso wɔantie na wɔamfa no asɛm; na mmom, wodii asoɔden a efi wɔn koma bɔne mu no akyi. Ɛno nti memaa nnome a efi apam a mahyɛ wɔn sɛ wonni so na wɔanni so no mu no baa wɔn so.’ ”
11.9: Na afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Atuatew apam bi wɔ Yudafo ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem no ntam.
11.10: Wɔasan kɔ wɔn agyanom a wɔampɛ sɛ wotie mʼasɛm no bɔne ho. Wɔadi anyame foforo akyi akɔsom wɔn. Yerusalem fifo ne Yuda fifo abu apam a me ne wɔn agyanom yɛe no so.
11.11: Ɛno nti nea Awurade se ni: ‘Mede amanehunu a wɔrentumi nguan mfi mu bɛba wɔn so. Ɛwɔ mu sɛ, wosu frɛ me de, nanso merennye wɔn so.
11.12: Yuda nkurow ne Yerusalemfo bɛkɔ akosu afrɛ anyame a wɔhyew nnuhuam ma wɔn no, nanso sɛ amanehunu ba a wɔrentumi mmoa wɔn koraa.
11.13: Wo Yuda, wowɔ anyame a wɔn dodow bɛyɛ sɛ wo nkurow; na afɔremuka a moasisi sɛ mobɛhyew nnuhuam wɔ so ama animguase nyame Baal no dɔɔso sɛ Yerusalem mmɔnten.’
11.14: “Mmɔ mpae mma saa nnipa yi, nni mma wɔn na nsrɛ mma wɔn, efisɛ, sɛ wosu frɛ me wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu a merennye wɔn so.
11.15: “Dɛn na me dɔfo reyɛ wɔ mʼasɔredan mubere a ɔne bebree hyehyɛ nsɛmmɔnedi ho?Ahodwira nam betumi abɔ wo asotwe agu ana?Sɛ woyɛ wʼamumɔyɛsɛm ana wʼani agye.”
11.16: Awurade, frɛ wo ngodua a enyin frɔmfrɔma ɛsow aba a ɛyɛ fɛ.Nanso ɔde ahum kɛse bi nteɛmubɛto mu gya,na ne mman bebubu.
11.17: Asafo Awurade a oduaa wo no ahyɛ amanehunu ho nkɔm wɔ wo ho, efisɛ Israel fifo ne Yuda fifo ayɛ bɔne ahyɛ me abufuw sɛ wɔhyew nnuhuam ma Baal.
11.18: Yeremia TirisopamEsiane sɛ Awurade yii pɔw a wabɔ kyerɛɛ me no nti, mihui, efisɛ saa bere no ɔde nea wɔreyɛ no kyerɛɛ me.
11.19: Meyɛɛ sɛ oguamma a odwo a wɔde no rekɔ akokum no; amma mʼadwene mu sɛ wɔabɔ wɔn tirim pɔw atia me sɛ,“Momma yɛnsɛe dua no ne nʼaba no;momma yentwa no mfi ateasefo asase so,sɛnea wɔnnkae ne din bio.”
11.20: Nanso wo, Asafo Awurade, wo a wubu atɛntreneena wosɔ koma ne adwene hwɛ,ma minhu wʼaweretɔ wɔ wɔn so,na wo nsam na mede me nsɛm nyinaa hyɛ.
11.21: Ɛno nti nea Awurade ka fa Anatot mmarima a wɔrehwehwɛ wo akum wo na wɔka se, “Nhyɛ nkɔm wɔ Awurade din mu anyɛ saa a, wubewu wɔ yɛn nsa ano,”
11.22: Ɛno nti, nea Asafo Awurade se ni: “Mɛtwe wɔn aso. Wɔn mmerante bewuwu afoa ano, na ɔkɔm bekunkum wɔn mmabarima ne mmabea.
11.23: Wɔrennya wɔn nkae biara mpo, efisɛ mede amanehunu bɛba Anatotfo so wɔ wɔn asotwe afe mu.”

12.1: Yeremia AnwiinwiiWoyɛ ɔtreneeni bere biara, Awurade,sɛ mede asɛm to wʼanim a.Nso me ne wo bɛkasa afa wʼatɛntrenee ho:Adɛn nti na amumɔyɛfo kwan si wɔn yiye?Adɛn nti na wɔn a wonni gyidi ho dwo wɔn?
12.2: Woadua wɔn, na wɔagye ntin;wonyinyin na wɔsow aba.Wɔbɔ wo din bere biarananso wɔn koma mmɛn wo.
12.3: Nanso wunim me, Awurade;wuhu me, na wosɔ mʼadwene a mewɔ wɔ wo ho no hwɛ.Twe wɔn kɔ sɛ nguan a wɔrekotwitwa wɔn mu!Yi wɔn si nkyɛn ma okumda!
12.4: Asase no nkyen nkosi da bɛnna prama so sare nguan nkosi da bɛn?Esiane sɛ wɔn a wɔte so no yɛ amumɔyɛfo ntimmoa ne nnomaa a wɔwɔ so awuwu.Na nnipa no da so ka se,“Ɔrenhu nea ɛba yɛn so.”
12.5: Onyankopɔn Mmuae“Sɛ wo ne mmarima atu mmirikaama woabrɛ a,ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wo ne apɔnkɔ besi mmirikakan?Sɛ wuhintiw wɔ asase petee so a,ɛno de, dɛn na wobɛyɛ wɔ Yordan ho nkyɛkyerɛ mu?
12.6: Wo nuabarimanom, wʼankasa abusuafo,wɔn mpo ayi wo ama;wɔteɛ mu dennen tia wo.Mfa wo ho nto wɔn so,sɛ mpo wɔka wo ho asɛm pa a.
12.7: “Megyaw me fi,ato mʼagyapade asaworam;mede nea medɔ no nobɛhyɛ nʼatamfo nsa.
12.8: Mʼagyapade ayɛ me sɛgyata a ɔwɔ kwae mu.Ɔbobɔ mu gu me so;ɛno nti metan no.
12.9: So mʼagyapade nyɛɛ me sɛ anomaaa nkekae sisi ne ho a ɔkyere mmoana nnomaa foforo a wɔkyere mmoa atwa ne ho ahyia resosɔw no ana?Monkɔboaboa nkekaboa nyinaa ano.Momfa wɔn mmra na wonkum wɔn.
12.10: Nguanhwɛfo bebree bɛsɛe me bobeturo,na wɔatiatia me mfuw so;wɔbɛdan me mfuw fɛɛfɛ noayɛ no asase hunu a ɛda mpan.
12.11: Ɛbɛyɛ asase a ada mpan a,awo wosee na ɛda hɔ kwa wɔ mʼanim;asase no nyinaa bɛda mpanefisɛ obiara nni hɔ a ɔhwɛ so.
12.12: Nkoko wosee a ɛwɔ nweatam no nyinaa so nona asɛefo bɛba abegu bebree,Awurade afoa bekunkum wɔnafi asase ano de akosi ano nohɔ;obiara remfa ne ho nni.
12.13: Wobedua atoko, nso wobetwa nsɔe;wɔbɛbrɛ wɔn ho nanso wɔrennya hwee.Wɔn ani bewu wɔ wɔn nnɔbaetwa ho.Awurade abufuwhyew nti.”
12.14: Nea Awurade se ni: “Na me yɔnkonom amumɔyɛfo a wɔfa agyapade a, mede maa me nkurɔfo Israelfo no de, metu wɔn afi wɔn nsase so na metu Yudafi afi wɔn mu.
12.15: Na sɛ mitu wɔn wie a, mehu wɔn mmɔbɔ bio, na mede wɔn mu biara bɛba nʼagyapade, ne nʼasase so.
12.16: Na sɛ wosua me nkurɔfo akwan yiye na wɔbɔ me din ka ntam se, ‘Nokware sɛ Awurade te ase yi’ a, ɛwɔ mu sɛ mmere bi wɔkyerɛɛ me nkurɔfo ma wɔde Baal kaa ntam de, nanso wɔn ase betim wɔ me nkurɔfo mu.
12.17: Nanso sɛ ɔman bi antie a, metu nʼase, na masɛe no korakora,” Awurade na ose.

13.1: Nwera AbɔsoSɛɛ na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me: “Kɔ na kɔtɔ nwera abɔso bɔ wʼasen, nanso mma no nka nsu.”
13.2: Enti metɔɔ abɔso sɛnea Awurade kyerɛe no, na mede bɔɔ mʼasen.
13.3: Afei, Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn ne mprenu so se,
13.4: “Fa abɔso a wotɔe a ɛbɔ wʼasen no kɔ Eufrate ho mprempren ara na fa kosie ɔbotan tokuru bi mu.”
13.5: Enti mede kosiee Eufrate ho, sɛnea Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me no.
13.6: Nna bebree akyi no, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Afei kɔ Eufrate ho na kɔfa abɔso a meka kyerɛɛ wo se fa kosie hɔ no.”
13.7: Enti mekɔɔ Eufrate ho kotuu abɔso no wɔ beae a mede siei no, nanso na asuw atetew a so nni mfaso biara.
13.8: Afei Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se,
13.9: “Sɛɛ na Awurade se, ‘Saa ara na mɛsɛe Yuda ahantan ne Yerusalem ahantankyɛnee no.
13.10: Saa amumɔyɛfo yi a wɔmpɛ sɛ wotie mʼasɛm na wodi wɔn komaden akyi na wodi anyame afoforo akyi som wɔn, sɔre wɔn no, bɛyɛ sɛ saa abɔso yi, na wɔn so remma mfaso biara!
13.11: Sɛnea abɔso kyekyere onipa asen no, saa ara na mede Israelfi ne Yudafi nyinaa bataa me ho sɛ wɔnyɛ me nkurɔfo a wɔbɛma me din so, aka mʼayeyi na wɔahyɛ me anuonyam, nanso wɔantie me,’ nea Awurade se ni.
13.12: Nsa Kotoku“Ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Nea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se ni, Wɔmfa nsa nhyɛ nsa kotoku biara ma.’ Na sɛ wɔka kyerɛ wo se, ‘Yenim sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde nsa hyɛ nsa kotoku biara ma a,’
13.13: afei ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Nea Awurade se ni: Mede nsabow bɛhyɛ wɔn a wɔtete asase yi so nyinaa ma, a ahemfo a wɔte Dawid ahengua so, asɔfo, adiyifo ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem nyinaa ka ho bi.
13.14: Mɛtotow wɔn abobɔ wɔn ho wɔn ho, agyanom ne mmabarima nyinaa, Awurade na ose. Meremma ahummɔbɔ anaa ayamye anaa ayamhyehye nsiw ɔsɛe a merebɛsɛe wɔn no ho kwan.’ ”
13.15: Nnommumfa Ho AhunahunaMuntie na monyɛ aso,na monnyɛ ahantan,efisɛ Awurade akasa.
13.16: Monhyɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn, anuonyamansa na wama sum aduru,ansa na mo anan ahintihintiwwɔ nkoko a ɛso reduru sum no so.Mo ani da hann so,nanso ɔbɛdan no sum kusuuna wɔasesa ayɛ no sum kabii.
13.17: Nanso sɛ moantie a,mesu wɔ kokoa muesiane mo ahantan nti;mʼani bɛtaataa nsu,na nusu aguare me,efisɛ wɔbɛfa Awurade nguankuw no akɔ nnommum mu.
13.18: Monka nkyerɛ ɔhene ne ɔhemmea se,“Mumfi mo ahengua so nsi fam,na mo anuonyam ahenkyɛwbefi mo ti so.”
13.19: Wɔbɛtoto Negeb nkuropɔn apon mu,na obiara nni hɔ a obebuebue.Wɔbɛsoa Yudafo akɔ nnommum muwobetwa wɔn asu koraa.
13.20: Mo mpagyaw mo ani nhwɛwɔn a wofi atifi fam reba no.Nguankuw a wɔde hyɛɛ mo nsa no,nguan a mode wɔn hoahoaa mo ho no wɔ he?
13.21: Sɛ Awurade de wɔn a wɔyɛ mo nnamfonom yɛ mo so atitiriw a,dɛn na mobɛka?Na ɛrenyɛ mo yawte sɛnea ɔbea ɔreko awo ana?
13.22: Na sɛ wubebisa wo ho se,“Adɛn nti na eyi aba me so a?”Na efi wʼamumɔyɛ bebrebe nonti na wɔatetew wo fam atade muayɛ wo nipadua basaa no.
13.23: Etiopiani betumi asesa nʼahosu ana?Na ɔsebɔ nso betumi asesa ne ho nsisimu no?Saa ara na worentumi nyɛ papa,wo a bɔneyɛ akokwaw wo no.
13.24: “Mɛbɔ mo ahwete sɛ ntɛtɛ a,nweatam so mframa rebɔ no.
13.25: Eyi ne nea mubenya,mo kyɛfa a mahyɛ ama mo,”Awurade na ose,“efisɛ mo werɛ afi mena mode mo ho ato anyame huhuw so.
13.26: Mɛtwe mo fam ntade abua mo animna wɔahu mo ahohora.
13.27: Mo aguamammɔ ne mo akɔnnɔ bɔne,mo aguamammɔ a momfɛre ho!Mahu mo nneyɛe bɔne nowɔ nkoko ne sare so.Due, Yerusalem!Wobɛyɛ fi akosi da bɛn?”

14.1: Nsuyow, Ɔkɔm, AfoaEyi ne Awurade asɛm a ɔde maa Yeremia a ɛfa nsuyow ho:
14.2: “Yuda resu,ne nkuropɔn hu amane;wɔbɔ asase no ho abubuw,na osu foro fi Yerusalem kɔ.
14.3: Mmapɔmma soma wɔn asomfo ma wɔkɔhwehwɛ nsu;wɔkɔhwɛ ahina munanso wonnya nsu.Wɔde wɔn asuhina san ba a hwee nni mu;wɔde awerɛhow ne abawpakatakata wɔn ti so.
14.4: Asase no apaapae,efisɛ osu ntɔ wɔ asase no so;akuafo no koma atutuna wɔkata wɔn ti so.
14.5: Mpo ɔforotebere a ɔwɔ sare sogyaw ne ba a wawo no foforo,efisɛ sare biara nni hɔ.
14.6: Sare so mfurum gyinagyina nkoko wosee no sohome sɛ sakraman;wɔkrankran wɔn ani hwehwɛ didibeananso wonhu bi.”
14.7: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ yɛn amumɔyɛ di adanse tia yɛn de,nanso Awurade, wo din nti yɛ ho biribi.Yɛn atuatew dɔɔso;na yɛayɛ bɔne atia wo.
14.8: Wo a woyɛ Israel Anidaso,nʼAgyenkwa wɔ amanehunu mmere mu,adɛn nti na woayɛ sɛ ɔhɔho wɔ asase no so,sɛ ɔkwantuni a ɔsoɛ anadwo?
14.9: Adɛn nti na woayɛ sɛ obi a ade afu ne mu yi,sɛ ɔkofo a onni ahoɔden a ɔde boa?Wowɔ yɛn ntam, Awuradena wo din da yɛn so;nnyaw yɛn mu!
14.10: Eyi ne nea Awurade ka fa saa nnipa yi ho:“Wɔn ani gye akyinkyinakyinkyin ho yiye;wɔmma wɔn anan nhome.Ɛno nti Awurade nnye wɔn nto mu;afei ɔbɛkae wɔn amumɔyɛsɛm nona watwe wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne ho.”
14.11: Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Mmɔ yiyeyɛ ho mpae mma saa nnipa yi.
14.12: Mmom ɛwɔ mu sɛ wodi mmuada de, nso merentie wɔn sufrɛ; ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔre ne aduan afɔre de, nso merennye. Mmom, mede afoa, ɔkɔm ne ɔyaredɔm bɛsɛe wɔn.”
14.13: Nanso mekae se, “Ao, Otumfo Awurade, adiyifo no ka kyerɛ wɔn daa se, ‘Morenhu afoa, na ɔkɔm remma. Nokware mɛma mo asomdwoe a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa wɔ ha.’ ”
14.14: Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Adiyifo no hyɛ akɔntoro wɔ me din mu. Mensomaa wɔn, minnyii wɔn na menkasa nkyerɛɛ wɔn ɛ. Wɔrehyɛ nkɔm fa atoro anisoadehu, asumansɛm, abosonsom ne wɔn ankasa nnaadaa adwene ho.
14.15: Ɛno nti, nea Awurade ka fa adiyifo a wɔde me din hyɛ nkɔm no ho ni: mensomaa wɔn nanso wɔka se, ‘Afoa biara anaa ɔkɔm biara remma asase yi so.’ Saa adiyifo no ara bɛtotɔ wɔ afoa ano ne ɔkɔm mu.
14.16: Na nnipa a wɔhyɛ nkɔm kyerɛ wɔn no, wɔbɛtotow wɔn agu Yerusalem mmɔnten so esiane ɔkɔm ne afoa nti. Wɔrenya obiara nsie wɔn: wɔn yerenom, wɔn mmabarima anaa wɔn mmabea. Mɛma amanehunu a ɛfata wɔn aba wɔn so.
14.17: “Ka saa asɛm yi kyerɛ wɔn:“ ‘ma nisu nguare meanadwo ne awia, a to ntwa,efisɛ Ɔbabea Babun no, me nkurɔfo,anya apirakuru a ɛyɛ huna ɛyɛ ahodwiriw mmoroso.
14.18: Sɛ mekɔ ɔman no mu a,mihu nnipa a wɔatotɔ wɔ afoa ano;sɛ mekɔ kuropɔn no mu amihu ɔkɔm nsunsuanso.Odiyifo ne ɔsɔfo nyinaakɔ asase a wonnim so so.’ ”
14.19: Woapo Yuda koraa ana?Wubu Sion animtiaa ana?Adɛn nti na wode ɔhaw aba yɛn sona yennya ayaresa?Yɛn ani daa asomdwoe so,nanso ade papa biara mmaa ɛ;yɛn ani daa ayaresa bere sonanso ehu na ɛbae.
14.20: Awurade, yegye yɛn amumɔyɛne yɛn agyanom afɔdi to mu;nokware, yɛayɛ bɔne atia wo.
14.21: Na wo din nti mmu yɛn animtiaa;nhura wʼanuonyam ahengua no ho.Kae wo ne yɛn apam nona mmu so.
14.22: Na amanaman ahoni ahuhuw no mu bi ma osu tɔ ana?Wim ankasa na ɛtɔ obosu ana?Dabi da, ɛyɛ wo, Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn.Enti wo so na yɛn ani da,na wo na woyɛ eyinom nyinaa.

15.1: Afei Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me se, “Sɛ mpo, Mose ne Samuel begyinaa mʼanim a anka me koma rentɔ nkɔ saa nnipa yi so. Ma womfi mʼani so! Ma wɔnkɔ!
15.2: Na sɛ wobisa wo se, ‘Ɛhe na yɛnkɔ’ a, ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“ ‘Wɔn a wɔahyɛ owu ama wɔn no, bɛkɔ owu mu;wɔn a wɔahyɛ afoa ama wɔn no bɛtotɔ wɔ afoa ano;wɔn a wɔahyɛ ɔkɔm ama wɔn no, ɔkɔm bɛde wɔn;wɔn a wɔahyɛ nnommumfa ama wɔn no bɛkɔ nnommum mu.’
15.3: “Mede adesɛefo ahorow anan bɛba wɔn so,” Awurade na ose, “afoa a ebekunkum wɔn, akraman a wɔbɛtwe wɔn ase akɔ, wim nnomaa ne asase so mmoa a wɔbɛtetew wɔn nam asɛe wɔn.
15.4: Mɛma wɔayɛ akyiwade ama asase so ahenni nyinaa, esiane nea Yudahene Hesekia babarima Manase yɛɛ wɔ Yerusalem nti.
15.5: “Hena na obehu wo mmɔbɔ, Yerusalem?Hena na obegyam wo?Hena na obegyina abisa sɛnea wo ho te?
15.6: Woapo me,” Awurade na ose.“Wugu akyirisan so ara.Ɛno nti mɛteɛ me nsa wɔ wo so na masɛe wo.Me yam renhyehye me mma wo bio.
15.7: Mede nhuhuwso apampaa behuhuw wɔn sowɔ asase no kuropɔn apon ano.Mede owu ne ɔsɛe bɛba me nkurɔfo so,efisɛ wɔnsakraa wɔn akwan ɛ.
15.8: Mɛma wɔn akunafo adɔɔsoasen mpoano nwea.Mede ɔsɛefo bɛba owigyinae,abɛhaw wɔn mmerante nanom;mpofirim medeɔyaw ne ehu bɛba wɔn so.
15.9: Ɔbeatan a wawo ason bɛtɔ beraw,na wagyaa mu.Ne wia bɛtɔ wɔ bere a ade nsaa ɛ;wobegu nʼanim ase abrɛ no ase.Mede nkae no bɛma afoawɔ wɔn atamfo anim,”Awurade na ose.
15.10: Ao, me na a wowoo me,onipa a asase no sofo nyinaa ne me ham, di aperepere!Memfɛm obi biribi na memmɔɔ bosea mfii obi hɔ ɛ,nanso obiara dome me.
15.11: Awurade kae se,“Nokware megye wo ama botae pa bi;ampa ara mɛma wʼatamfo apa wo kyɛwwɔ amanehunu ne ahohia mmere mu.
15.12: “Onipa betumi abu dade mudade a efi atifi fam, anaa kɔbere?
15.13: “Mo ahode ne mo nnwetɛbonamede bɛma sɛ wɔmfom a wɔrentua ka,esiane mo nnebɔne nyinaawɔ mo man no mu nti.
15.14: Mede mo bɛyɛ nkoa ama mo atamfowɔ ɔman a munnim so so,mʼabufuw bɛma ogya adɛwna ɛbɛhyew mo.”
15.15: Wote ase, Awurade;kae me na hwɛ me so.Tɔ wɔn a wɔtaa me no so were.Wowɔ abodwokyɛre, mma me nwu;hwɛ sɛnea wo nti wɔbɔ me ahohora.
15.16: Wo nsɛm bae no, midii;ɛyɛɛ mʼahosɛpɛw ne me koma apɛde,na wo din da me so,Ao, Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn.
15.17: Mantena wɔn a wogye wɔn ani fekuw mu,ne wɔn annye wɔn ani;metew me ho tenae, efisɛ wo nsa daa me sona wʼabufuw hyɛɛ me ma.
15.18: Adɛn nti na me yaw to ntwa dana mʼapirakuru ayɛ akisikuru a ano yɛ den?Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ sɛ nnaadaa asuwa ma me,sɛ asuti a ɛyow ana?
15.19: Enti sɛɛ na Awurade se,“Sɛ wosakra wʼadwene a megye wo ato mu biona woasom me;sɛ nsɛm a edi mu fi wʼanom, na ɛnyɛ nsɛm huhuw a,wobɛyɛ me kasamafo.Ma saa nnipa yi nnan mmra wo nkyɛn,na wo de, ɛnsɛ sɛ wodan kɔ wɔn nkyɛn.
15.20: Mede wo bɛyɛ ɔfasu ama saa nnipa yi,bammɔ fasu a wɔde kɔbere ato;wɔne wo bedi asinanso wɔrenni wo so nkonim,efisɛ me ne wo wɔ hɔsɛ meyi wo na magye wo nkwa,”Awurade, na ose.
15.21: “Megye wo nkwa afi amumɔyɛfo nsamna mayi wo afi atirimɔdenfo nsam.”

16.1: Amanehunu DaAfei Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se:
16.2: “Ɛnsɛ sɛ woware na wowo mmabarima anaa mmabea wɔ ha.”
16.3: Sɛɛ na Awurade ka fa mmabarima ne mmabea a wɔwo wɔn asase yi so; mmea a wɔyɛ wɔn nanom ne mmarima a wɔyɛ wɔn agyanom no ho:
16.4: “Owuyare bekunkum wɔn. Wɔrensu wɔn na wɔrensie wɔn, mmom wɔbɛyɛ sɛ sumina a egugu fam. Wɔbɛtotɔ afoa ano na ɔkɔm bekunkum wɔn na wɔn afunu bɛyɛ aduan ama wim nnomaa ne asase so mmoa.”
16.5: “Nhyɛn ofi a ayiyɛ aponto wo mu; nkosu wɔn abia, na mma wɔn hyɛden, efisɛ mayi me nhyira, me dɔ ne mʼahummɔbɔ afi saa nnipa yi so,” Awurade na ose.
16.6: Atitiriw ne mpapahwekwa bewuwu wɔ asase yi so. Wɔrensie wɔn na wɔrensu wɔn na obiara remmɔ ne ho kam, na ɔrenyi ne ti wɔ wɔn nti.
16.7: Obiara remma wɔn a wodi awufo no ho awerɛhow no aduan mfa nkyekye wɔn werɛ, owufo no agya anaa ne na mpo, obiara remma wɔn nsa mfa nkyekye wɔn werɛ.
16.8: “Na nhyɛn ofi a aponto kɔ so wɔ mu nkɔtena ase, nnidi na nnom.
16.9: Na sɛɛ na Awurade Tumfo, Israel Nyankopɔn no se: Wo nkwanna mu a wʼani tua no, mede ahosɛpɛw ne anigye nnyigyei, ayeforokunu ne ayeforo ahosɛpɛw nne a ɛwɔ ha no bɛba awiei.
16.10: “Sɛ woka eyinom nyinaa kyerɛ saa nnipa yi na wobisa wo se, ‘Adɛn nti na Awurade abɔ atoyerɛnkyɛm a ɛyɛ hu sɛɛ atia yɛn? Dɛn mfomso na yɛayɛ? Bɔne bɛn na yɛayɛ atia Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn’ a,
16.11: ɛno de ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Efisɛ mo agyanom gyaw me hɔ kodii anyame foforo akyi, kɔsom wɔn sɔree wɔn, Awurade asɛm ni. Wogyaw me na wɔanni me mmara so.
16.12: Na mo de, moayɛ amumɔyɛsɛm asen mo agyanom. Monhwɛ sɛnea mo mu biara di ne koma bɔne asoɔden akyi wɔ bere a anka ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ osetie ma me.
16.13: Ɛno nti, metu mo afi saa asase yi so de mo akɔ asase a, mo anaasɛ mo agyanom nnim so, na mobɛsom anyame foforo wɔ hɔ awia ne anadwo, na merenhu mo mmɔbɔ.’
16.14: “Nanso nna no reba,” Awurade na ose, “a nnipa renka bio se, ‘Sɛ Awurade te ase yi, nea oyii Israelfo fii Misraim,’
16.15: mmom, wɔbɛka se, ‘Sɛ Awurade te ase yi nea oyii Israelfo fii atifi fam asase ne aman a otuu wɔn kɔɔ so nyinaa.’ Efisɛ mɛsan de wɔn aba asase a mede maa wɔn tete agyanom no no so.
16.16: “Na mprempren, mɛsoma apopofo bebree a wɔbɛkyere wɔn.” Awurade na ose. “Ɛno akyi, mɛsoma akɔfa abɔmmɔfo bebree a wɔbɛtaataa wɔn wɔ mmepɔw ne nkoko nyinaa so ne abotan atokuru mu.
16.17: Mʼani tua wɔn akwan nyinaa; enhintaw me, na wɔn bɔne nso nhintaw wɔ mʼani so.
16.18: Metua wɔn amumɔyɛ ne wɔn bɔne so ka mprenu, efisɛ wɔde aniwude nsɛsode a enni nkwa ne wɔn ahoni a ɛyɛ akyiwade abɛhyɛ mʼagyapade so ma de agu mʼasase ho fi.”
16.19: Awurade, mʼahoɔden ne mʼabandennen,mʼahohia mu guankɔbea,wo nkyɛn na amanaman no bɛba;wobefi nsase ano aka se,“Yɛn agyanom annya biribiara sɛ anyame huhuw,ahoni a wɔn so nni mfaso na wɔammoa wɔn.
16.20: Nnipa yɛ wɔn ankasa anyame ana?Yiw, nanso wɔnyɛ nokware anyame!”
16.21: “Ɛno nti mɛkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn,saa bere yi nea mɛkyerɛ wɔn,me tumi ne mʼahoɔden.Afei wobehu sɛme din ne Awurade.

17.1: “Wɔde dade kyerɛwdua akrukyerɛw Yuda bɔne,dade kyerɛwdua a ano te sɛ kyerɛwbo,wɔ wɔn koma apon sone wɔn afɔremuka mmɛn so.
17.2: Mpo, wɔn mma kaewɔn afɔremuka ne Asera nnuaa ɛwɔ nnua a adennan no nkyɛnne nkoko atenten no so.
17.3: Me mmepɔw a ɛwɔ asase no so,mo ahonyade ne mo nnwetɛbona nyinaamede bɛma sɛ asade,ɛne mo sorɔnsorɔmmea nso,esiane mo man no so bɔne nti.
17.4: Mo ankasa mfomso nti mobɛhwereagyapade a mede maa mo no.Mede mo bɛyɛ nkoa ama mo atamfowɔ asase a munnim so so,efisɛ moahwanyan mʼabufuw,na ɛbɛtena hɔ daa.”
17.5: Sɛɛ na Awurade se,“Nnome nka nea ɔde ne ho to onipa so,nea ɔde ne ho to ɔhonam so pɛ nʼahoɔdenna ne koma dan fi Awurade ho.
17.6: Ɔbɛyɛ sɛ wura a ɛwɔ nsase tamaa so;sɛ yiyedi ba a ɔrenhu,ɔbɛtena nweatam a awo so,ne nkyene asase a obi nte so so.
17.7: “Nhyira nka onipa a ɔde ne ho to Awurade so,na nʼanidaso wɔ ne mu.
17.8: Ɔbɛyɛ sɛ dua a wɔadua no asu hona ne ntin teɛ kɔ asu no mu.Sɛ ahuhuru ba a onsuro;ne nhaban yɛ frɔmfrɔm mmere nyinaa.Onni ɔhaw biara wɔ afe a osu ntɔ muna ɛkɔ so sow aba daa.”
17.9: Koma yɛ nnaadaa sen ade nyinaana ano nni aduru.Hena na ɔbɛte nʼase?
17.10: “Me Awurade, mepɛɛpɛɛ koma muna mehwehwɛ adwene mu,gyina so de tua onipa ka sɛnea nʼabrabɔ te,ne sɛnea ɛfata ne nneyɛe.”
17.11: Sɛnea asɛmɛntɛ a osow nkesua a ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔtowee no,saa ara na onipa a onya sika a ɔmfa ɔkwan pa so no te.Sɛ obu ne nkwa nna mu abien a wobegyaw no mu,na awiei no, ne kwasea bɛda adi.
17.12: Anuonyam ahengua a wɔama so fi mfiase no,ne yɛn kronkronbea.
17.13: Awurade, woyɛ Israel anidaso,wɔn a wɔpa wʼakyi nyinaa ani bewu.Wɔn a wɔtwe wɔn ho fi wo ho no, wobesie wɔnefisɛ wɔagyaw Awuradea ɔyɛ nkwa asuti no.
17.14: Sa me yare Awurade, na me ho bɛtɔ me;gye me na menya nkwa,na wo ne ɔbaako a mekamfo wo.
17.15: Wobisa me daa sɛ,“Ɛhe na Awurade asɛm no wɔ?Ma ɛmmra mu mprempren!”
17.16: Minnguan mfii mʼadwuma sɛ wo guanhwɛfo ho;wunim sɛ menhwehwɛɛ abasamtu da.Nea efi mʼanom yɛ pefee wɔ wʼanim.
17.17: Nhunahuna me;wo ne me guankɔbea wɔ amanehunu da.
17.18: Ma wɔn a wɔtaa me anim ngu ase,na yi me fi ahohora mu.Ma wɔmmɔ hu,nanso mma me koma ntu.Ma amanehunu da no mmra wɔn so;fa ɔhawprenu sɛe wɔn.
17.19: Monyɛ Homeda No KronkronSɛɛ na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me, “Kɔ na kogyina nnipa no pon a Yuda ahemfo di hɔ ahyɛmfiri no; kogyina Yerusalem apon a aka no nso ano.
17.20: Ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Muntie Awurade asɛm, mo Yuda ahemfo ne Yudafo nyinaa ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem a wɔfa saa apon yi mu.
17.21: Sɛɛ na Awurade se: Monhwɛ yiye na moansoa nnesoa Homeda anaa moamfa amfa Yerusalem apon mu.
17.22: Monnsoa adesoa mfi mo afi mu na monnyɛ adwuma biara Homeda, na mmom monyɛ Homeda no kronkron, sɛnea mehyɛɛ mo agyanom no.
17.23: Nanso wɔantie na wɔammu; wɔyɛɛ asoɔden, wɔantie na wɔampɛ nteɛso.
17.24: Nanso sɛ mohwɛ yiye na moyɛ osetie ma me a, sɛɛ na Awurade se, na moamfa nnesoa amfa saa kuropɔn yi apon mu Homeda, na sɛ moyɛ Homeda no kronkron a monnyɛ adwuma biara a,
17.25: ɛno de ahemfo a wɔte Dawid ahengua so ne wɔn adwumayɛfo bɛfa saa apon yi mu. Wɔn nyinaa bɛba a wɔtete nteaseɛnam mu ne apɔnkɔ so, a Yuda mmarima ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem ka ho, na nnipa bɛtena kuropɔn yi mu daa nyinaa.
17.26: Nnipa befi Yuda nkurow ne nkuraa a atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia no aba, wobefi Benyamin asase ne atɔe fam nkoko so, wobefi mmepɔw, mantam ne Negeb aba a wɔde ɔhyew afɔrebɔde ne afɔrebɔ, aduan afɔrebɔde, nnuhuam ne aseda afɔrebɔde reba Awurade fi.
17.27: Nanso sɛ moanyɛ osetie amma me, anyɛ Homeda no kronkron, na sɛ mosoa adesoa biara fa Yerusalem apon mu Homeda a, ɛno de mɛsɔ ogya a ɛrennum da wɔ Yerusalem apon mu na abɛhyew nʼaban ahorow no.’ ”

18.1: Ɔnwemfo No FiEyi ne Awurade asɛm a ɛbaa Yeremia nkyɛn.
18.2: “Kɔ ɔnwemfo no fi, na hɔ na mede mʼasɛm no bɛma wo.”
18.3: Ɛno nti, mekɔɔ ɔnwemfo no fi na mihuu no sɛ, ɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ ne ntwahode so.
18.4: Nanso kuku a na ɔde dɔte no reyɛ ho adwuma no sɛe wɔ ne nsam; ɛno nti ɔnwemfo no yɛɛ kuku foforo, sɛnea eye pa ara ma no.
18.5: Afei Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se:
18.6: “Israelfi, merentumi nyɛ mo sɛnea ɔnwemfo yi yɛ ana?” Awurade na ose. “Sɛnea dɔte te wɔ ɔnwemfo nsam no, saa ara na mote wɔ me nsam, Israelfi.
18.7: Sɛ bere biara meka se ɛsɛ sɛ wotutu ɔman bi anaa ahenni bi ase, dwerɛw wɔn, sɛe wɔn a,
18.8: na sɛ ɔman a mebɔɔ no kɔkɔ no sakra fi ne bɔne ho a, mɛsakra mʼadwene na meremfa amanehunu a misusuwii sɛ mede bɛba wɔn so mma bio.
18.9: Na sɛ mmere foforo bi meka se, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔkyekye ɔman anaa ahenni bi gye no si hɔ,
18.10: na sɛ ɔyɛ bɔne wɔ mʼani so na wanyɛ osetie amma me a, ɛno de mesan adwene papa a mepɛɛ sɛ meyɛ no no ho.
18.11: “Na afei ka kyerɛ Yudafo ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem no se, ‘Sɛɛ na Awurade se: Hwɛ! mede amanehunu reba mo so, na mereyɛ nhyehyɛe a etia mo. Ɛno nti mo mu biara nnan mfi nʼakwammɔne so na munsiesie mo akwan ne mo nneyɛe.’
18.12: Nanso wobebua se, ‘So nni mfaso. Yɛbɛkɔ so adi yɛn ara yɛn nhyehyɛe so; yɛn mu biara bɛyɛ asoɔden a efi ne koma bɔne mu.’ ”
18.13: Ɛno nti nea Awurade se ni,“Mummisa wɔ amanaman no mu se,hena na wate biribi sɛɛ pɛn?Ɔbabun Israel ayɛade bi a ɛyɛ hu yiye.
18.14: So sukyerɛmma a ɛwɔ Lebanon noyera fi nʼabotan a esian no so ana?So nʼatifi nsu wiridudu a efi akyirikyirino gyae sen ana?
18.15: Nanso me nkurɔfo werɛ afi me.Wɔhyew nnuhuam ma ahoni huhuw,a ɛma wohintihintiw wɔ wɔn akwan sone tete atempɔn so.Wɔma wɔfa kwatikwanne akwan a wɔmmɔe so.
18.16: Wɔn asase bɛda mpan,na ayɛ ade a wobebu no animtiaa daa;wɔn a wotwa mu hɔ no ho bedwiriw wɔnna wobehinhim wɔn ti.
18.17: Sɛnea apuei mframa te no,mɛbɔ wɔn ahwete wɔ wɔn atamfo anim;mɛdan mʼakyi akyerɛ wɔn na ɛnyɛ mʼanimwɔ wɔn amanehunu da no.”
18.18: Wɔkae se, “Mommra ma yɛmfa adwene ntia Yeremia; sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a asɔfo no nkyerɛkyerɛ a ɛfa mmara no ho, anyansafo no afotu anaa asɛm a efi adiyifo hɔ no renyera. Mommra na yentu yɛn ano ngu ne so a yɛrentie nea ɔbɛka biara.”
18.19: Yɛ aso ma me, Awurade;tie nea wɔn a wɔpam me ti so no reka!
18.20: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde bɔne tua papa so ka ana?Nanso wɔatu amoa ama me.Kae sɛ migyinaa wʼanimna mekasa maa wɔn,sɛnea wubeyi wʼabufuwhyew afi wɔn so.
18.21: Ɛno nti, ma ɔkɔm nne wɔn mma;yi wɔn ma afoa.Ma wɔn yerenom nyɛ abonin ne akunafo;ma wonkunkum wɔn mmarima,na wɔmfa afoa nkunkum wɔn mmerante wɔ ɔko mu.
18.22: Ma wɔnte osu wɔ wɔn afi mubere a atamfo atu wɔn so sa mpofirim,efisɛ wɔatu amoa ama me,na wɔasunsum mʼanan mfiri.
18.23: Nanso wunim Awurade,pɔw a wɔabɔ nyinaa se wobekum me.Mfa wɔn nsɛmmɔne nkyɛ wɔn,na nyi wʼani mfi wɔn bɔne so.Ma wonni nkogu wɔ wʼanim;na wo ne wɔn nni wɔ wʼabufuw mu.

19.1: Sɛɛ na Awurade se: “Kɔ na kɔtɔ dɔtekuruwa fi ɔnwemfo nkyɛn. Fa nnipa no mpanyimfo no mu bi ne asɔfo no mu bi ka wo ho
19.2: na fi adi kɔ Ben Hinom Bon a ɛbɛn Pɔthɛd Pon ano no. Ɛhɔ na pae mu ka nsɛm a meka kyerɛ wo no,
19.3: se, ‘Muntie Awurade asɛm, mo Yuda ahemfo ne Yerusalemfo. Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade Israel Nyankopɔn se. Muntie, mede amanehunu reba ha, na obiara a ɔbɛte no aso mu bɛyɛ no yonn.
19.4: Efisɛ wɔagyaw me na wɔde ha ama ananafo anyame; wɔahyew afɔrebɔde wɔ so ama anyame a wɔn anaa wɔn agyanom, anaa Yuda ahemfo nhuu wɔn da, na wɔde mogya a edi bem ahyɛ ha ma.
19.5: Wɔasisi Baal sorɔnsorɔmmea sɛ wɔde ogya bɛhyew wɔn mmabarima sɛ afɔrebɔde ama Baal, ade a manhyɛ anaa mammɔ so, anaa amma mʼadwene mu.
19.6: Ɛno nti, monhwɛ yiye na nna bi reba, Awurade na ose, a nnipa remfrɛ ha se Tofet anaa Ben Hinom Bon bio, na mmom, Okum Bon.
19.7: “ ‘Mɛsɛe Yuda ne Yerusalem nhyehyɛe wɔ ha. Mɛma wɔatotɔ wɔ afoa ano wɔ wɔn atamfo a wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn nkwa no anim, na mede wɔn afunu bɛma wim nnomaa ne asase so mmoa sɛ wɔn aduan.
19.8: Mɛsɛe saa kuropɔn yi na mayɛ no ahodwiriwde; wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ hɔ no nyinaa ho bedwiriw wɔn, na nʼapirakuru no nti wobedi ne ho fɛw.
19.9: Mɛma wɔawe wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea nam, na wobefi ahohia a atamfo a wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn nkwa no anotua de bɛba wɔn so no mu awe wɔn ho wɔn ho nam.’
19.10: “Afei bɔ kuruwa no wɔ wɔn a wɔka wo ho no anim ma wɔnhwɛ,
19.11: na ka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se: Mɛbɔ saa ɔman yi ne kuropɔn yi sɛnea wɔabɔ ɔnwemfo kuruwa yi a wɔrentumi nsiesie bio. Wobesie awufo wɔ Tofet kosi sɛ, ɛhɔ bɛyɛ ma.
19.12: Sɛɛ ara na mɛyɛ saa beae yi ne wɔn a wɔtete so, Awurade na ose. Mɛyɛ kuropɔn yi sɛ Tofet.
19.13: Afi a ɛwɔ Yerusalem ne Yuda ahemfo ahemfi ho begu fi te sɛ Tofet ha. Afi a wɔhyew nnuhuam wɔ adan atifi maa ɔsoro asafo nyinaa na woguu nsa maa anyame foforo no.’ ”
19.14: Afei Yeremia san fii Tofet, faako a Awurade somaa no se ɔnkɔhyɛ nkɔm wɔ hɔ no bae, na Obegyinaa Awurade asɔredan abangua mu na ɔka kyerɛɛ nnipa no nyinaa se,
19.15: “Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se, ‘Muntie! Mede amanehunu a meka guu kuropɔn yi ne ho nkuraase no nyinaa so no bɛba wɔn so, efisɛ wɔyɛɛ asoɔden, na wɔantie me nsɛm.’ ”

20.1: Yeremia Ne PashurBere a Imer a ɔyɛ Awurade asɔredan mu adwumayɛfo so panyin babarima ɔsɔfo Pashur tee sɛ Yeremia rehyɛ nkɔm fa saa nneɛma yi ho no,
20.2: ɔma wɔboroo Yeremia, na wɔbɔɔ no dua mu wɔ Benyamin Atifi Pon a ɛwɔ Awurade asɔredan no mu hɔ no.
20.3: Ade kyee a Pashur san no no, Yeremia ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade din a ɔde ama wo no nyɛ Pashur na mmom Magormisabib.
20.4: Na sɛɛ na Awurade se: ‘Mɛma wo ho ayɛ hu ama wʼankasa ne wo nnamfonom nyinaa, wʼankasa de wʼani behu sɛ wɔtotɔ wɔ wɔn atamfo mfoa ano. Mede Yuda nyinaa bɛma Babiloniahene na wasoa wɔn akɔ Babilonia anaasɛ ɔde afoa bekunkum wɔn.
20.5: Mede kuropɔn yi ahode, nʼadwumayɛ so aba, ne nneɛma a ɛsom bo ne Yuda ahemfo nnwetɛbona nyinaa bɛma wɔn atamfo. Wɔbɛfa no sɛ asade akɔ Babilonia.
20.6: Na wo Pashur, ne wo fifo nyinaa bɛkɔ nnommum mu wɔ Babilonia. Ɛhɔ na wo ne wo nnamfonom a wohyɛɛ wɔn akɔntoro no nyinaa bewuwu na wɔasie mo.’ ”
20.7: Yeremia AnwiinwiiAwurade, wodaadaa me na ɛbaa mu saa;wudii me so na wutintim me so.Wodii me ho fɛw da mu nyinaa;na obiara serew me.
20.8: Bere biara a mɛkasa no, meteɛ mu,pae mu ka akakabensɛm ne ɔsɛe.Enti Awurade asɛm de ahohora ne nsopaabrɛ me da mu nyinaa.
20.9: Sɛ meka se, “Meremmɔ ne dinanaa merenkasa wɔ ne din mu” a,nʼasɛm te sɛ ogya wɔ me koma mu,ogya a wɔde ahyɛ me nnompe mu,mabrɛ ne ne kitanokware, merentumi.
20.10: Mete asomsɛm bebree sɛ,“Ehu wɔ baabiara!Montoa no! Momma yɛnkɔtoa no!”Me nnamfonom nyinaaretwɛn sɛ mɛwatiri, na wɔka se,“Ebia wɔbɛdaadaa no;na yɛatumi noatɔ ne so were.”
20.11: Nanso Awurade ka me ho sɛ dɔmbarima;enti mʼataafo bɛwatiri na wɔrentumi.Wobedi nkogu na wobegu wɔn anim ase pasaa;wɔn werɛ remfi wɔn nsopa no da.
20.12: Asafo Awurade! Wo a wosɔ ɔtreneeni hwɛna wopɛɛpɛɛ koma ne adwene mu,ma minhu wʼaweretɔ wɔ wɔn so,efisɛ mede mʼasɛm dan wo.
20.13: Monto dwom mma Awurade!Munyi Awurade ayɛ!Ogye ohiani nkwa fiamumɔyɛfo nsam.
20.14: Nnome nka da a wɔwoo me!Nhyira mpare da a me na woo me.
20.15: Nnome nka onipa a ɔbɛbɔɔ mʼagya amanneɛ,nea ɔmaa nʼani gyei, na ɔkae se,“Wɔawo ɔbabarima ama wo!”
20.16: Ma saa onipa no nyɛ sɛ nkurow aAwurade tu gui a wannya ahummɔbɔ no.Ma ɔnte osu anɔpa,ne akobɛn nnyigyei owigyinae.
20.17: Sɛ wankum me wɔ awotwaa muamma me na anyɛ ɔda amma me no nti,nʼawotwaa yɛɛ kɛse afebɔɔ.
20.18: Adɛn koraa na mifii awotwaa mu puebehuu ɔhaw ne awerɛhowna mede aniwu rebewie me nkwa nna yi?

21.1: Awurade Po Sedekia AbisadeAsɛm fi Awurade hɔ baa Yeremia nkyɛn bere a ɔhene Sedekia somaa Malkia babarima Pashur ne Maaseia babarima ɔsɔfo Sefania kɔɔ ne nkyɛn no. Wɔkae se,
21.2: “Bisa Awurade, ma yɛn efisɛ Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar ne yɛn rebedi ako. Ebia Awurade bɛyɛ anwonwade ama yɛn, sɛnea ɔyɛɛ mmere bi a atwa mu no na ama wafi yɛn so akɔ.”
21.3: Na Yeremia buaa wɔn se, “Monka nkyerɛ Sedekia se,
21.4: ‘Sɛnea Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, se ni: Merebɛdan mo nsam akode atia mo, nea mode reko atia Babiloniahene ne Babiloniafo a wɔwɔ ɔfasu no akyi na wɔatua mo kuropɔn no ano. Mɛboa wɔn ano wɔ kuropɔn yi mu.
21.5: Me ara mede nsa a mateɛ ne abasa a ɛyɛ den bɛko atia mo wɔ abufuw, anibere ne abufuwhyew mu.
21.6: Mɛbobɔ wɔn a wɔtete kuropɔn yi mu ahwehwe fam; nnipa ne mmoa nyinaa, na ɔyaredɔm a ɛyɛ hu bekunkum wɔn.
21.7: Ɛno akyi, Awurade asɛm ni, mede Yudahene Sedekia, nʼadwumayɛfo ne nnipa a wɔwɔ kuropɔn yi mu a ɔyaredɔm, afoa ne ɔkɔm ankunkum wɔn no bɛma Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar ne wɔn atamfo a wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn nkwa no. Ɔde afoa bekunkum wɔn; ɔrenhu wɔn mmɔbɔ na ɔrennya ayamhyehye mma wɔn.’
21.8: “Bio, ka kyerɛ nnipa no se, ‘Eyi ne nea Awurade se: Hwɛ mede nkwa kwan ne owu kwan resi mo anim.
21.9: Obiara a ɔte saa kuropɔn yi mu bewu wɔ afoa anaa ɔkɔm anaa ɔyaredɔm ano. Nanso obiara a obepue na ɔde ne ho akɔma Babiloniafo a wɔabetua mo kuropɔn yi no, bɛfa ne ho adi.
21.10: Mawe ahinam sɛ mɛyɛ kuropɔn yi bɔne na ɛnyɛ papa, Awurade na ose. Wɔde bɛhyɛ Babiloniahene nsa, na ɔde ogya bɛhyew no.’
21.11: “Nea ɛka ho ne sɛ, ka kyerɛ Yuda adehye se, ‘Muntie Awurade asɛm;
21.12: Dawidfi, sɛɛ na Awurade se:“ ‘Mummu atɛntrenee anɔpa biara;munnye nea wɔabɔ no korɔn nomfi ne nhyɛsofo nsam,anyɛ saa a, mʼabufuwhyew bɛsɔre na ahyew sɛ ogyaesiane bɔne a moayɛ nti,ɛbɛhyew a obiara rennum no.
21.13: Mene mo anya, YerusalemMo a mote obon yi atifiabotan asasetaw so,Awurade na ose,mo a moka se, “Hena na obetumi ako atia yɛn?Hena na obetumi ahyɛn yɛn hintabea?”
21.14: Mɛtwe mo aso sɛnea ɛfata mo nneyɛe,Awurade na ose.Mɛto mo kwae mu gya,a ɛbɛhyew biribiara a atwa mo ho ahyia no.’ ”

22.1: Atemmu A Etia Ahemfo AmumɔyɛfoSɛɛ na Awurade se, “Sian kɔ Yudahene ahemfi na kɔpae mu ka saa asɛm yi:
22.2: ‘Tie Awurade asɛm, Yudahene, wo a wote Dawid ahengua so, wo, wʼakannifo ne wo nkurɔfo a wɔfa apon yi mu.
22.3: Sɛɛ na Awurade se: Monyɛ nea ɛteɛ na ɛnam kwan mu. Munnye nea wɔabɔ no korɔn mfi ne hyɛsofo nsam. Monnyɛ ɔhɔho, ayisaa ne okunafo bɔne na monnyɛ wɔn basabasa nso, na munnhwie mogya a edi bem ngu wɔ ha.
22.4: Sɛ moyɛ ahwɛyie na mudi saa ahyɛde yi so a, ɛno de ahemfo a wɔte Dawid ahengua so ne wɔn adwumayɛfo ne wɔn nkurɔfo bɛfa saa ahemfi apon yi mu, a wɔtete nteaseɛnam mu ne apɔnkɔ so.
22.5: Enti sɛ moanni saa nhyehyɛe yi so a, Awurade na ose, “Meka me ho ntam sɛ, saa ahemfi yi bɛdan ofituw.” ’ ”
22.6: Nea Awurade ka fa Yudahene ahemfi ho ni:“Ɛwɔ mu wote sɛ Gilead ma me,te sɛ Lebanon mmepɔw atifi,nokware, mɛyɛ wo sɛ nweatam,sɛ nkurow a obiara nte mu.
22.7: Mɛsoma asɛefo abɛtoa mo,obiara ne nʼakode,wobetwitwa mo sida mpuran fɛfɛ no muna wɔatow agu ogya no mu.
22.8: “Nnipa a wofifi aman bebree so betwa mu wɔ kuropɔn yi so, na wobebisabisa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, ‘Adɛn nti na Awurade ayɛ saa kuropɔn kɛse yi sɛɛ?’
22.9: Na mmuae no bɛyɛ sɛ, ‘Efisɛ wɔagyaw Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn apam no akɔsɔre anyame afoforo asom wɔn.’ ”
22.10: Munnsu ɔhene a wafi mu, na munni ne ho awerɛhow;mmom, munsu dennen mma nea ɔkɔ nnommum mu,efisɛ ɔrensan nʼakyina ɔrenhu asase a wɔwoo no wɔ so no bio.
22.11: Na sɛɛ na Awurade ka faa Yosia babarima Salum a odii nʼagya ade sɛ Yudahene na wafi ha no ho: “Ɔrensan mma bio.
22.12: Obewu wɔ faako a wɔafa no nnommum kɔ hɔ; na ɔrenhu saa asase yi bio.”
22.13: “Nnome nka nea ɔmfa ɔkwan trenee so nsi nʼahemfi,ɔde asisi si nʼabansoro,ɔma ne manfo yɛ adwuma kwa,ontua wɔn apaade so ka.
22.14: Ɔka se, ‘Mesi ahemfi kɛse ama me honea ɛwɔ abansoro adan a mu soso.’Enti ɔyɛ mfɛnsere akɛse wɔ mu,ɔde sida dura muna ɔde ahosu kɔkɔɔ hyehyɛ mu.
22.15: “Wowɔ sida bebree ana ɛma woyɛ ɔhene ana?Na wʼagya nni aduan ne nsa ana?Ɔyɛɛ nea ɛfa ne kwan mu na ɛteɛ,enti esii no yiye.
22.16: Odii mmɔborɔfo ne ahiafo nsɛm maa wɔn,enti biribiara yɛɛ yiye maa no.Na ɛnyɛ eyi na ɛkyerɛ sɛ obi nim me ana?”Awurade na ose.
22.17: “Mo ani ne mo komawɔ mfaso bɔne nko ara so,sɛ muhwie mogya a edi bem guna moyɛ nhyɛso ne asisi nso.”
22.18: Ɛno nti, sɛɛ na Awurade ka fa Yudahene Yosia babarima Yehoiakim ho:“Wɔrensu no:‘A, me nuabarima! A, me nuabea!’Wɔrensu no:‘A, me wura! A, nʼahoɔfɛ!’
22.19: Wobesie no sɛ afurum,wɔbɛtwe nʼase na wɔatow no akyeneYerusalem apon akyi.”
22.20: “Monkɔ Lebanon nkosu,momma wɔnte mo nne wɔ Basan,munsu mfi Abarim,efisɛ wɔadwerɛw mo dɔm nyinaa.
22.21: Mebɔɔ wo kɔkɔ, bere a na ɛyɛ wo sɛ wʼasom adwo wo no,nanso wokae se, ‘Merentie!’Eyi ne ɔkwan a wonam so fi wo mmerantebere mu;woanyɛ osetie amma me.
22.22: Mframa bɛbɔ wo nguanhwɛfo nyinaa akɔ,na wʼapamfo nyinaa bɛkɔ nnommum mu.Afei wʼani bewu na wʼanim agu aseesiane wʼamumɔyɛ nyinaa nti.
22.23: Mo a mote Lebanon,na modeda sida adan mu,sɛnea mubesi apini wɔ ɔyaw mu,ɔyaw ɛte sɛ ɔbea a ɔreko awo de.
22.24: “Nokware, sɛ mete ase yi,” Awurade na ose, “Mpo sɛ wo Yehoiakin, Yudahene Yehoiakim babarima yɛ me nsa nifa so nsɔwano kaa a, anka mɛworɔw wo.
22.25: Mede wo bɛma wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ wo kra, wɔn a wusuro wɔn no; Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar ne Babiloniafo.
22.26: Mɛpam wo ne ɛna a ɔwoo wo no akogu ɔman foforo so, baabi a ɛnyɛ hɔ na wɔwoo mo mu biara, hɔ na mo baanu bewuwu.
22.27: Morensan mma asase a mo kɔn dɔ sɛ mobɛsan aba so no so bio.”
22.28: Saa ɔbarima Yehoiakin yi yɛ asɛnka a abɔade a obiara mpɛ ana?Adɛn nti na wɔbɛpam ɔne ne mma,akogu asase a wonnim so no so?
22.29: Ao, asase, asase, asase!Tie Awurade asɛm!
22.30: Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Monkyerɛw ɔbarima yi ho asɛm nto hɔ te sɛ obi a onni ba,ɔbarima a ɔrennya nkɔso ne nkwa nna nyinaana nʼasefo mu biara rennya nkɔso,na wɔn mu biara rentena Dawid ahengua sona wɔrenni Yuda so hene bio.”

23.1: Trenee Dubaa No“Nnome nka nguanhwɛfo a wɔsɛe na wɔhwete me nguankuw no!” Awurade na ose.
23.2: Ɛno nti sɛɛ na Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, ka kyerɛ ahwɛfo a wɔhwɛ me nkurɔfo so ni: “Esiane sɛ moabɔ me nguankuw ahwete, na moapam wɔn na moanhwɛ wɔn so yiye no nti, mede asotwe bɛbrɛ mo, mo bɔne a moayɛ no nti,” nea Awurade se ni.
23.3: “Mʼankasa mɛboaboa me nguan nkae no afi aman a mapam wɔn akɔ hɔ nyinaa no so na mede wɔn bɛsan aba wɔn adidibea bio, baabi wɔbɛwowo na wɔn ase atrɛw.
23.4: Na meyi nguanhwɛfo a wɔbɛhwɛ wɔn so, na wɔrensuro na wɔremmɔ hu bio na wɔn mu baako mpo renyera.” Awurade na ose.
23.5: “Nna bi reba,” Awurade na ose,“sɛ mɛma trenee dubaa bi so ama Dawidɔhene bi a obedi ade nyansa muna wayɛ nea ɛteɛ ne nea eye wɔ asase yi so.
23.6: Ne mmere so, wobegye Yuda nkwana Israel bɛtena ase wɔ asomdwoe mu.Eyi ne din a wɔde bɛfrɛ no:Awurade Yɛn Trenee.
23.7: Na afei nna bi reba,” Awurade na ose, “a nnipa renka bio se, ‘Nokware sɛ Awurade te ase yi, nea oyii Israelfo fii Misraim,’
23.8: na mmom, wɔbɛka se, ‘Nokware sɛ Awurade te ase yi, nea oyii Israel asefo fii atifi asase so ne aman nyinaa a ɔpam wɔn kɔɔ hɔ no so no.’ Na afei wɔbɛtena wɔn ankasa asase so.”
23.9: Atoro AdiyifoNea ɛfa adiyifo no ho no:Me koma abubu wɔ me mu;me nnompe nyinaa wosow.Mete sɛ ɔsabowfo,mete sɛ obi a nsa abow no,esiane Awuradene ne nsɛm kronkron no nti.
23.10: Aguamammɔfo ahyɛ asase no so ma;nnome no nti asase no awo wosee,adidibea a ɛwɔ nweatam no so ahyew.Adiyifo no nam ɔkwan bɔne sode wɔn tumi yɛ nea ɛnteɛ.
23.11: “Odiyifo ne ɔsɔfo nyinaa nsuro Nyankopɔn;mʼasɔredan mu mpo mihu wɔn amumɔyɛsɛm,”Awurade na ose.
23.12: “Ɛno nti, wɔn kwan so bɛyɛ torotorootoro;wɔbɛpam wɔn akɔ sum muna hɔ na wɔbɛhwehwe ase.Mede amanehunu bɛba wɔn sowɔ afe a wɔbɛtwe wɔn aso mu no,”Awurade na ose.
23.13: “Samaria adiyifo mu nomihuu saa atantanne yi:Wɔde Baal hyɛɛ nkɔmnam so maa me nkurɔfo Israelfo fom kwan.
23.14: Na Yerusalem adiyifo mu nomahu ade a ɛyɛ hu:Wɔsɛe aware na wodi atoro.Wɔhyɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne no mpamuden,enti obiara ntwe ne ho mfi nʼamumɔyɛsɛm ho.Wɔn nyinaa te sɛ Sodom ma me;na Yerusalemfo te sɛ Gomora.”
23.15: Ɛno nti sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, se fa adiyifo no ho:“Mɛma wɔadi aduan a ɛyɛ nwenna wɔanom nsu a awuduru wɔ mu,efisɛ Yerusalem adiyifo nti,bɔneyɛ ahyɛ asase yi so ma.”
23.16: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se:“Munntie nkɔm a adiyifo no hyɛ kyerɛ mo;wɔma mo nya anidaso a enni nnyinaso.Wɔbɔ wɔn tirim ka anisoadehu,a emfi Awurade anom.
23.17: Wɔkɔ so ka kyerɛ wɔn a wobu me animtiaa no se,‘Awurade se: Mubenya asomdwoe.’Na wɔn a wodi wɔn komaden akyi no nyinaa,wɔka kyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Ɔhaw biara remma mo so.’
23.18: Na wɔn mu hena na wasɔre wɔ Awurade agyinatufo musɛ ɔbɛhwɛ anaa obetie nʼasɛm?Hena na wayɛ aso ate nʼasɛm?
23.19: Hwɛ, Awurade ahumbetu abufuwhyew mu,mfɛtɛ bedi kyinhyia wɔamumɔyɛfo mpampam.
23.20: Awurade abufuw rensankosi sɛ obewiene koma mu nhyehyɛe nyinaa.Nna a ɛreba no mu nomobɛte ase yiye.
23.21: Mansoma saa adiyifo yi,nanso wɔde wɔn asɛm akyinkyin;mamma wɔn nkra biara,nanso wɔahyɛ nkɔm.
23.22: Sɛ wɔkaa mʼagyinatufo ho a,anka wɔbɛpae mu aka mʼasɛm akyerɛ me nkurɔfona ama wɔatwe wɔn ho afi wɔn akwammɔnene wɔn nneyɛe bɔne ho.
23.23: “Meyɛ Onyankopɔn a mebɛn nko ara anaa,”Awurade na ose,“na menyɛ Onyankopɔn a mewɔ akyirikyiri nso?
23.24: Obi betumi de ne ho asie baabi amerentumi nhu no ana?”Awurade na ose.“Menyɛɛ ɔsoro ne asase so ma ana?”Awurade na ose.
23.25: “Mate nea adiyifo a wɔde me din hyɛ atoro nkɔm no keka. Wɔkeka se, ‘Mesoo dae! Mesoo dae!’
23.26: Eyi bɛkɔ so akosi da bɛn wɔ atoro adiyifo yi koma mu? Wɔn a wɔbɔ wɔn tirim hyɛ nnaadaa nkɔm?
23.27: Wodwen sɛ dae a wɔkeka kyerɛkyerɛ wɔn ho no bɛma me nkurɔfo werɛ afi me din, sɛnea Baal som nti wɔn agyanom werɛ fii me din no.
23.28: Ma odiyifo a waso dae no nka nʼadaeso, na ma nea ɔwɔ mʼasɛm no nka no nokware mu. Na dɛn na ntɛtɛ ne awi wɔ yɛ?” Awurade na ose.
23.29: “Na mʼasɛm nte sɛ ogya,” Awurade na ose, “ɛnte sɛ asae a ɛpaapae ɔbotan mu nketenkete ana?
23.30: “Ɛno nti,” Awurade na ose, “mikyi adiyifo a wɔfa nsɛm a efi wɔn yɔnkonom nkyɛn, na wɔpae mu ka no sɛnea efi me nkyɛn no.
23.31: Yiw,” Awurade asɛm ni, “mikyi saa adiyifo a wɔde wɔn ankasa tɛkrɛmawo ka se, ‘Awurade na ose.’
23.32: Nokware, mikyi wɔn a wɔhyɛ adaeso ho atoro nkɔm,” Awurade na ose. “Wɔka kyerɛ wɔn na wɔde atoro nsɛm daadaa me nkurɔfo ma wɔfom kwan, nso mensomaa wɔn na minnyii wɔn. Wɔn so nni mfaso mma saa nnipa yi koraa,” Awurade na ose.
23.33: Atoro Adiyisɛm Ne Atoro Adiyifo“Sɛ saa nnipa yi, anaa odiyifo anaa ɔsɔfo bisa mo se, ‘Dɛn ne Awurade adiyisɛm no a?’ Monka nkyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Adiyisɛm bɛn? Mɛpo mo, Awurade na ose.’
23.34: Sɛ odiyifo bi, ɔsɔfo bi anaa obi foforo si so dua se, ‘Awurade adiyisɛm ni’ a, mɛtwe saa ɔbarima no ne ne fifo aso.
23.35: Eyi ne nea mo mu biara kɔ so ka kyerɛ ne yɔnko anaa ne busuani: ‘Awurade mmuae ne dɛn?’ Anaa ‘Dɛn na Awurade aka?’
23.36: Nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mobɔ ‘Awurade adiyisɛm’ so bio; efisɛ obiara asɛm bɛyɛ nʼadiyisɛm, ne saa nti modannan nsɛm a efi Onyankopɔn, Ɔteasefo, Asafo Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no mu.
23.37: Eyi ne nea mokɔ so ka kyerɛ odiyifo: ‘Mmuae bɛn na Awurade de ama mo?’ Anaa ‘Asɛm bɛn na Awurade aka?’
23.38: Ɛwɔ mu, musi so dua se, ‘Eyi ne Awurade adiyisɛm’ nanso sɛɛ na Awurade ka: Mokae se, ‘Eyi yɛ Awurade adiyisɛm,’ wɔ bere a maka akyerɛ mo se monnka saa nsɛm yi bio.
23.39: Afei, nokware, me werɛ befi mo, na mapam mo ne kuropɔn a mede maa mo ne mo agyanom afi mʼani so.
23.40: Na mede daa animguase, ne daa ahohora a werɛ remfi da bɛba mo so.”

24.1: Borɔdɔma Nkɛntɛn AbienBabiloniahene Nebukadnessar faa Yudahene Yehoiakyin a ɔyɛ Yehoiakim babarima, nʼadwumayɛfo, nʼadwumfo ne nʼatomfo a wɔwɔ Yuda fii Yerusalem kɔɔ nnommum mu wɔ Babilonia no akyi no, Awurade kyerɛɛ me borɔdɔma nkɛntɛn abien a wɔde asisi Awurade asɔredan no anim.
24.2: Kɛntɛn baako mu borɔdɔma no yɛ papa te sɛ nea ɛbere ntɛm; borɔdɔma a ɛwɔ kɛntɛn a ɛka ho no mu no nye sɛ wodi mpo.
24.3: Na Awurade bisaa me se, “Dɛn na wuhu, Yeremia?”Mibuae se, “Borɔdɔma, nea eye pa ara, ne nea enye mma sɛ wodi mpo.”
24.4: Na Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn se,
24.5: “Sɛɛ na Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se: ‘Borɔdɔma papa no gyina hɔ ma atukɔfo a wofi Yuda, wɔn a mitwaa wɔn asu kɔɔ Babilonia asase so no.
24.6: Mɛma mʼani aku wɔn ho, ama wɔn yiyedi, na mɛsan de wɔn aba ha bio. Mesiesie wɔn na merensɛe wɔn. Medua wɔn, na merentu wɔn ase.
24.7: Mɛma wɔn koma a wɔde behu me sɛ, me ne Awurade. Wɔbɛyɛ me nkurɔfo, na mɛyɛ wɔn Nyankopɔn, efisɛ wɔde wɔn koma nyinaa bɛsan aba me nkyɛn.
24.8: “ ‘Nanso te sɛ borɔdɔma a enye no, nea enye sɛnea wodi mpo no,’ nea Awurade se ni, ‘saa ara na mɛyɛ Yudahene Sedekia, nʼadwumayɛfo ne Yerusalem nkae no, sɛ wɔte asase yi so anaa wɔte Misraim.
24.9: Mɛma wɔn ayɛ akyide ne mfomsode ama ahenni a ɛwɔ asase so nyinaa, wɔbɛyɛ ahohora na wɔabɔ wɔn din bɔne, wɔbɛyɛ akyiwade ne mmusu baabiara a mɛpam wɔn akɔ.
24.10: Mɛsoma afoa, ɔkɔm ne ɔyaredɔm akɔ wɔn so kosi sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wɔn koraa afi asase a mede maa wɔn ne wɔn agyanom no so.’ ”

25.1: Mfe Aduɔson NkoasomAsɛm a ɛfa Yudafo nyinaa ho baa Yeremia nkyɛn wɔ Yudahene Yosia babarima Yehoiakim adedi afe a ɛto so anan a ɛyɛ Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar adedi afe a edi kan no mu.
25.2: Enti odiyifo Yeremia ka kyerɛɛ Yudafo ne wɔn a wɔtete Yerusalem nyinaa se,
25.3: Mfe aduonu abiɛsa ni, efi Yudahene Amon babarima Yosia adedi afe a ɛto so dumiɛnsa besi nnɛ, Awurade asɛm aba me so na makasa akyerɛ mo mpɛn bebree, nanso muntiei ɛ.
25.4: Mpo Awurade asoma nʼasomfo a wɔyɛ nʼadiyifo aba mo nkyɛn mpɛn bebree, na muntiee wɔn, na monyɛɛ aso mmaa wɔn ɛ.
25.5: Wɔkae se, “Mo mu biara mfi nʼakwan bɔne ne ne nneyɛe bɔne ho, na mubetumi atena asase a Awurade de maa mo ne mo agyanom no so afebɔɔ.
25.6: Munni anyame foforo akyi nkɔsom wɔn, nsɔre wɔn; mommfa nea mode mo nsa ayɛ no nhyɛ me abufuw. Afei merenhaw mo.”
25.7: “Nanso moantie me,” Awurade na ose, “na mode nea mode mo nsa ayɛ ahyɛ me abufuw, na mode ɔhaw aba mo so.”
25.8: Afei nea Asafo Awurade se ni: “Esiane sɛ moantie me nsɛm no nti,
25.9: mɛfrɛ atifi fam nnipa nyinaa ne mʼakoa Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar,” Awurade na ose, “na mede wɔn abɛko atia saa asase yi ne sofo, ne amanaman a wɔatwa ho ahyia nyinaa. Mɛsɛe wɔn pasaa na mayɛ wɔn ahodwiriwde ne fɛwdi, ne amamfo afebɔɔ.
25.10: Meyi ahosan ne anigye nnyigyei, ayeforokunu ne ayeforo nne, awiyammo nnyigyei ne kanea hann afi wɔn mu.
25.11: Ɔman mu no nyinaa bɛdan asase wosee, na saa amanaman yi bɛsom Babiloniahene mfirihyia aduɔson.
25.12: “Na mfirihyia aduɔson awiei no, mɛtwe Babiloniahene ne ne man, Babiloniafo asase aso wɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ ho, mɛdan no amamfo afebɔɔ,” sɛnea Awurade se ni.
25.13: “Mɛma asotwe a mahyɛ atia asase no nyinaa aba wɔn so, nea wɔakyerɛw wɔ nhoma yi mu na Yeremia ahyɛ ho nkɔm atia aman no nyinaa no.
25.14: Wɔn ankasa de, amanaman bebree ne ahempɔn de wɔn bɛyɛ nkoa; na metua wɔn nneyɛe ne wɔn nsa ano adwuma so ka.”
25.15: Onyankopɔn Abufuwhyew Kuruwa NoSɛɛ na Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, ka kyerɛɛ me: “Gye saa kuruwa yi a mʼabufuwhyew nsa ahyɛ no ma yi, na ma amanaman a mɛsoma wo wɔn nkyɛn no nyinaa nnom.
25.16: Sɛ wɔnom a, wɔbɛtɔ ntintan na wɔabobɔ dam esiane afoa a mɛsoma akɔ wɔn so no nti.”
25.17: Ɛno nti, migyee kuruwa no fii Awurade nsam, na memaa amanaman a ɔsomaa me wɔn nkyɛn no nomee:
25.18: Yerusalem ne Yuda nkurow, nʼahemfo ne ne nnwumayɛfo sɛ wɔnyɛ ɔsɛe, aninyanne, animɔharefo ne nnome, sɛnea wɔte nnɛ da yi.
25.19: Misraimhene Farao, nʼasomfo, nʼadwumayɛfo ne ne manfo nyinaa,
