48.43: Ehu, nkonomoa ne afiri retwɛn mo,Moabfo,”Awurade na ose.
48.44: “Nea oguan nea ɛyɛ hu nobɛtɔ nkonomoa mu,nea ɔbɛforo afi nkonomoa no mu noafide beyi no;na mede Moab asotwe afe no bɛba ne so,”Awurade na ose.
48.45: “Hesbon nwini asena aguanfo no gyinagyina a wonni mmoa biara,efisɛ ogya bi atu afi Hesbon;ogyaframa bi fi Sihon mfimfini;ɛhyew Moab moma,ne ahohoahoafo a wɔn ano yɛ den no ti koraa.
48.46: Nnome nka wo, wo Moab!Wɔasɛe Kemos nkurɔfo no;wɔde wo mmabarima kɔ nnommum muna wo mmabea nso kɔ nkoasom mu.
48.47: “Nanso mede Moab adenya bɛsan ama nowɔ nna a ɛbɛba no mu,”Awurade na ose.Moab atemmu no awiei ni.

49.1: Asɛm A Ɛfa Amon HoNea ɛfa Amonfo ho:Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Israel nni mmabarima ana?Onni wɔn a wobedi nʼade?Ɛno de adɛn nti na Molek afa Gad ayɛ ne de yi?Adɛn nti na ne nkurɔfo tete ne nkurow mu?
49.2: Nanso nna no reba,”Awurade na ose.“Bere a mɛbobɔ mu de afrɛ ɔkoatia Raba a ɛyɛ Amonfo de;ɛbɛyɛ afabo siw,wɔbɛto nkuraa a atwa ne ho ahyia no mu gya.Na Israel bɛpam wɔn awɔpam no no,”sɛɛ na Awurade se.
49.3: “Twa adwo. Hesbon, efisɛ wɔasɛe Ai!Monteɛ mu, mo a mowɔ Raba!Mumfura ayitam na munni awerɛhow;mommɔ nnyenyen wɔ afasu no mu,efisɛ Molek bɛkɔ nnommum mu,ɔne nʼasɔfo ne nʼadwumayɛfo.
49.4: Adɛn nti na wode wʼabon ahorow no hoahoa wo ho,wʼabon a wunya mu aba bebree no nti?Amon Babea a Onni nokware,wode wo ho to wʼahonya so na woka se,‘Hena na ɔbɛtow ahyɛ me so?’
49.5: Mede ehu bɛba wo so,ebefi wɔn a wɔatwa wo ho ahyia no nyinaa,”Awurade na ose, Asafo Awurade no.“Wɔbɛpam mo nyinaa,na obiara remmoaboa akobɔfo ano.
49.6: “Nanso akyiri no, mɛsan de Amonfo adenya ama wɔn,”sɛe na Awurade se.
49.7: Asɛm A Ɛfa Edom HoNea ɛfa Edom ho:Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se:“Nyansa nni Teman bio ana?Afotu ayera wɔ anyansafo mu ana?Wɔn nyansa no aporɔw ana?
49.8: Monnan mo ho na munguan,monkɔtetɛw abodan a mu dɔ mu,mo a motete Dedan,efisɛ mede amanehunu bɛba Esau sowɔ bere a mɛtwe nʼaso no.
49.9: Sɛ bobetetewfo no baa mo nkyɛn aanka wɔrennya bobe no kakra ana?Sɛ akorɔmfo baa ɔdasu mu a,anka wɔrenwia ade dodow a wɔpɛ ana?
49.10: Na mɛma Esau ada adagyaw.Mɛda ne hintabea ahorow adi,sɛnea ɔrentumi mfa ne ho nhintaw.Ne mma, nʼabusuafo ne ne mfɛfo bewuwu,na wɔrenhu no bio.
49.11: Munnyaw mo ayisaa, mɛbɔ wɔn nkwa ho ban.Mo akunafo nso betumi de wɔn ho ato me so.”
49.12: Nea Awurade se ni: “Sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔmfata sɛ wɔnom kuruwa no nom a, ɛno de adɛn nti na ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔtwe mo aso? Wɔbɛtwe mo aso na mobɛnom nso.
49.13: Meka me ho ntam sɛ wɔbɛsɛe Bosra na ayɛ ahodwiriwde, ahohorade ne nnome; na ne nkurow nyinaa bɛsɛe afebɔɔ,” Awurade na ose.
49.14: Mate asɛm a efi Awurade nkyɛn:wɔsomaa ananmusini bi sɛ ɔnkɔka nkyerɛ amanaman no se,“Mommoaboa mo ho ano nkɔtow nhyɛ no so!Monsɔre nkɔ ɔko!”
49.15: “Na mɛyɛ wo ketewa wɔ aman no mu,na wɔabu wo animtiaa.
49.16: Ehu a wobɔne koma mu ahomaso adaadaa wo,wo a wote abotan ntokuru mu,na wote koko no sorɔnsorɔmmea.Ɛwɔ mu, woyɛ wo berebuw wɔ sorosoro sɛ ɔkɔre de,nanso hɔ na mefi de wo aba fam,”Awurade na ose.
49.17: “Edom bɛyɛ ahodwiriwde;wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ hɔ no nyinaa ho bedwiriw wɔn na wɔadi ne ho fɛwesiane nʼapirakuru nyinaa nti.
49.18: Sɛnea wɔdan Sodom ne Gomorane wɔn nkurow gui no,”Awurade na ose,“saa ara na obiara rentena hɔ;onipa biara rentena mu.
49.19: “Sɛnea gyata a ofi Yordan nkyɛkyerɛ murekɔ adidibea frɔmfrɔm no,saa ara na mɛtaa Edom afi nʼasase so wɔ bere tiaa bi mu.Hena ne nea mayi no sɛ ɔnyɛ eyi?Hena na ɔte sɛ me, na hena na obetumi ne me adi asi?Na oguanhwɛfo bɛn na obetumi asɔre atia me?”
49.20: Enti tie nea Awurade ahyehyɛ atia Edom,nea wabɔ ne tirim sɛ ɔbɛyɛ de atia wɔn a wɔte Teman ni:Nguankuw no mu nkumaa no wɔbɛtwe wɔn akɔ;wɔn nti ɔbɛsɛe adidibea no koraa.
49.21: Wɔn asehwe nnyigyei bɛma asase awosow;wɔn nteɛteɛmu gyegyeegye akodu Po Kɔkɔɔ ho.
49.22: Monhwɛ! Ɔkɔre bi betu akɔ soro na wabɔ hoo aba fam awatrɛtrɛw ne ntaban mu wɔ Bosra so.Saa da no Edom dɔmmarima komabetu sɛ ɔbea a ɔrekyem wɔ awo so.
49.23: Asɛm A Ɛfa Damasko HoNea ɛfa Damasko ho:“Hamat ne Arpad di yaw,efisɛ wɔate asɛmmɔne.Wɔn koma abotowte sɛ po a ayɛ hagyahagya.
49.24: Damasko ayɛ mmerɛw,wayɛ sɛ ɔrebeguanwabɔ huboa;ahoyeraw ne ɔyaw akyekyere no,ɔyaw a ɛte sɛ ɔbea a, ɔrekyem wɔ awo so.
49.25: Adɛn nti na wonnyaw kuropɔn a agye din yi ntoo hɔ,kurow a mʼani gye mu?
49.26: Ampa ara ne mmerante bɛtotɔ wɔ mmɔnten so;wɔbɛma nʼasraafo nyinaa aka wɔn ano ato mu saa da no,”sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se.
49.27: “Mede ogya bɛto Damasko afasu mu;na ɛbɛhyew Ben-Hadad aban.”
49.28: Asɛm A Ɛfa Kedar Ne Hasor HoNea ɛfa Kedar ne Hasor ahenni, a Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar tow hyɛɛ so no.Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Sɔre na kɔtow hyɛ Kedar sona sɛe nnipa a wɔwɔ apuei fam no.
49.29: Wɔbɛfa wɔn ntamadan ne wɔn nguankuw;wɔbɛfa wɔn nkataso,ne wɔn ho nneɛma ne yoma akɔ.Nnipa bɛteɛteɛ mu se,‘Ehu wɔ baabiara!’
49.30: “Munguan nkɔ ntɛmntɛm!Monhyehyɛ abodan a mu dɔ mu, mo a motete Hasor,”Awurade na ose.“Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar apam mo ti so;wayɛ nhyehyɛe a etia mo.
49.31: “Sɔre kɔtow hyɛ ɔman bi so a woremmrɛ,ɔman a wɔte ahotoso mu,”Awurade na ose,“ɔman a wonni apon anaa akwanside;na emu nnipa nko ara na wɔte.
49.32: Wɔn mfurum bɛyɛ asade,na wɔn anantwikuw akɛse no bɛyɛ asade.Mɛbɔ saa nnipa a wɔtete akyirikyiri no ahwete ama mframa no,na mede amanehunu befi afa nyinaa aba wɔn so,”Awurade na ose.
49.33: “Hasor bɛyɛ ahade ama adompo,ɛbɛda mpan afebɔɔ.Obiara rentena hɔ;onipa biara rentena mu.”
49.34: Asɛm A Ɛfa Elam HoEyi ne asɛm a, efi Awurade nkyɛn baa odiyifo Yeremia hɔ a ɛfa Elam ho, wɔ Yudahene Sedekia adedi mfiase:
49.35: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se:“Hwɛ mebubu Elam agyan mu,nea wɔn ahoɔden gyina so no.
49.36: Mede mframa anan no bɛba Elam soafi ɔsorosoro afanan;mɛbɔ wɔn ahwete mframa anan no mu,na ɔman biara nni hɔ aElam atubrafo renkɔ so.
49.37: Mɛbɔ Elam ahwete wɔ wɔn atamfo anim,wɔ wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn akum wɔn no anim;mede amanehunu bɛba wɔn sompo mʼabufuwhyew no,”Awurade na ose.“Mede afoa bɛtaa wɔnkosi sɛ, mewie wɔn korakora.
49.38: Mesi mʼahengua wɔ Elamna masɛe ne hene ne nʼadwumayɛfo,”Awurade na ose.
49.39: “Nanso mɛsan de Elam adenya ama nonna a ɛreba no mu,”Awurade na ose.

50.1: Asɛm A Ɛfa Babilonia HoAsɛm a Awurade nam odiyifo Yeremia so ka faa Babilonia ne Babiloniafo asase ho ni:
50.2: “Mommɔ no dawuru na mompae mu nka wɔ amanaman mu.Momma frankaa so na mompae mu nka;na momma wɔnte sɛ,‘Wɔbɛfa Babilonia;wobegu Bel anim ase,na ehu bɛhyɛ Merodak ma.Wobegu ne nsɛsode anim asena ehu bɛhyɛ nʼahoni ma.’
50.3: Ɔman bi fi atifi fam bɛtow ahyɛ ne sona wɔbɛyɛ nʼasase amamfo.Obiara rentena so;nnipa ne mmoa beguan afi so.
50.4: “Nna no mu ne saa bere no,”Awurade na ose,“Israelfo ne Yudafo bɛka abɔ mude nusu akɔhwehwɛ wɔn Awurade, wɔn Nyankopɔn.
50.5: Wobebisa ɔkwan a ɛkɔ Sionna wɔde wɔn ani akyerɛ hɔ.Wɔbɛba de wɔn ho abɛbɔ Awuradewɔ daa apam awerɛ remfi mu.
50.6: “Me nkurɔfo ayɛ nguan a wɔayera;wɔn nguanhwɛfo ama wɔafom ɔkwanma wokyinkyin mmepɔw so.Wokyinkyin bepɔw ne koko sona wɔn werɛ fii wɔn ankasa homebea.
50.7: Obiara a ohuu wɔn no tetew wɔn mu:wɔn atamfo kae se, ‘Yenni fɔ,efisɛ wɔyɛɛ bɔne tiaa Awurade, wɔn nokware didibea no,Awurade wɔn agyanom anidaso no.’
50.8: “Munguan mfi Babilonia;mumfi Babiloniafo asase so,na monyɛ sɛ mpapo a wodi nguankuw anim.
50.9: Mɛkanyan amanaman akɛse nkabomafi atifi fam asase so de wɔn abɛko atia Babilonia.Wobegyinagyina wɔn afa atia no,wobefi atifi fam ako afa no.Wɔn agyan bɛyɛ sɛ dɔmmarima a wɔakwadaw akodi mu,wɔn a wɔmmfa nsapan nsan wɔn akyi.
50.10: Enti wɔbɛfow Babilonia;wɔn a wɔfow no nyinaa benya asade bebree,”Awurade na ose.
50.11: “Esiane sɛ mo ani gye na mudi ahurusi,mo a mofow mʼagyapade,sɛ muhuruhuruw anigye so te sɛ nantwiforo a ɔwɔ sare frɔmfrɔm muna musu te sɛ apɔnkɔnini nti,
50.12: wo na ani bewu pa ara;nea ɔwoo wo anim begu ase.Ɔbɛyɛ akumaa wɔ amanaman no mu,sare, asase wosee ne nweatam.
50.13: Awurade abufuw nti, obiara rentena hɔna ɛbɛda mpan korakora.Wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ Babilonia nyinaa ho bedwiriw wɔn na wɔadi ne ho fɛwesiane nʼapirakuru nyinaa nti.
50.14: “Munnyinagyina mo afa ntwa Babilonia ho nhyia,mo a motow agyan nyinaa.Montow no! Munnyaw bɛmma biara,efisɛ wayɛ bɔne atia Awurade.
50.15: Monteɛ mu ntia no wɔ afanan nyinaa!Ɔma ne nsa so, nʼabandennen bubu,wodwiriw nʼafasu gu fam.Esiane sɛ eyi yɛ Awurade aweretɔ no nti,montɔ ne so were;monyɛ no sɛnea wayɛ afoforo no.
50.16: Munyi ogufo mfi Babilonia,ɔne otwafo a okura ne kantankrankyi wɔ otwabere mu no.Esiane nhyɛsofo no afoa ntiobiara nsan nkɔ ne nkurɔfo mu,obiara nguan nkɔ nʼankasa asase so.
50.17: “Israel yɛ nguankuw a wɔahwetea gyata apam wɔn.Nea odii kan tetew ne muyɛ Asiriahene;na nea ɔdwerɛwee ne nnompe akyiri noyɛ Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar.”
50.18: Ɛno nti, sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn se:“Mɛtwe Babiloniahene ne nʼasase asosɛnea metwee Asiriahene aso no.
50.19: Na mede Israel bɛsan aba nʼankasa didibea,na obedidi wɔ Karmel ne Basan;ɔbɛmee wɔ Efraim ne Gilead nkoko so.
50.20: Saa nna no ne saa bere no,”Awurade na ose,“Wɔbɛhwehwɛ Israel afɔbu mu,nanso wɔrennya bi,wɔbɛhwehwɛ Yuda nnebɔne mu,nanso wɔrenhu bi,efisɛ, mede nkae a migyaa wɔn no bɔne bɛkyɛ wɔn.
50.21: “Montow nhyɛ Merataim asase sone nnipa a wɔte Pekod.Montaa wɔn, munkunkum wɔnna monsɛe wɔn korakora,”Awurade na ose.“Monyɛ biribiara a mahyɛ mo no.
50.22: Ɔko mu gyegyeegye wɔ asase no so,ɔsɛe kɛse nnyigyei!
50.23: Hwɛ sɛnea wɔabubu na wɔabobɔasase nyinaa so asae!Hwɛ sɛnea Babilonia ada mpanwɔ amanaman no mu!
50.24: Misum wo afiri, Babilonia,na eyii wo ansa na worehu;wohuu wo kyeree woefisɛ woko tiaa Awurade.
50.25: Otumfo Awurade abue nʼakode adekoradanna wayi nʼabufuwhyew akode de apue,efisɛ Asafo Awurade wɔ adwuma yɛwɔ Babiloniafo asase so.
50.26: Mumfi akyirikyiri mmra ne so.Mummubu nʼasan no ani;monhɔre no siw sɛ awi akuwakuw.Monsɛe no korakorana munnyaw nkae biara mma no.
50.27: Munkunkum nʼanatwinini nyinaa;momfa wɔn nkɔ mma wonkokum wɔn!Mmusu nka wɔn! Efisɛ wɔn da no adu,bere a wɔde bɛtwe wɔn aso no.
50.28: Muntie akobɔfo ne aguanfo a wofi Babilonia nosɛ wɔreka wɔ Sionsɛnea Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn atɔ were,nʼasɔrefi ho aweretɔ.
50.29: “Momfrɛ agyantowfo nkɔtoa Babilonia,wɔn a wɔtow agyan nyinaa.Muntwa ne ho nhyia;mommma obiara nguan.Muntua ne nneyɛe so ka;monyɛ no sɛnea wayɛ.Efisɛ wabu Awurade animtiaa,Israel kronkronni no.
50.30: Enti ne mmerante bɛtotɔ wɔ mmɔnten so;wɔbɛtɔre nʼasraafo nyinaa ase saa da no,”Awurade na ose.
50.31: “Hwɛ, mikyi wo; ɔhantanni.”Awurade, Asafo Awurade na ose,“efisɛ wo da no adubere a wɔde bɛtwe wʼaso no.
50.32: Ɔhantanni no behintiw na wahwe ase,obiara remmoa no mma ɔnnsɔre;mɛto ne nkurow mu gyana ahyew wɔn a atwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa.”
50.33: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade se:“Wɔhyɛ Israelfo so,na Yudafo nso saa ara.Wɔn nnommumfafo no kura wɔn dennena wɔmpɛ sɛ wogyaa wɔn ma wɔkɔ.
50.34: Nanso wɔn Gyefo yɛ ɔhoɔdenfo;ne din ne Asafo Awurade.Obedi wɔn asɛm ama wɔn anibere so,sɛnea ɔde ahotɔ bɛba wɔn asase no so,na wɔn a wɔte Babilonia no nea wahyɛ wɔn ahometew.
50.35: “Afoa a etia Babiloniafo!”Awurade na ose,“etia wɔn a wɔte Babiloniana etia nʼadwumayɛfo ne nʼanyansafo!
50.36: Afoa a etia nʼatoro adiyifo!Wɔbɛdan nkwaseafo.Afoa a etia nʼakofo!Ehu bɛhyɛ wɔn ma.
50.37: Afoa a etia nʼapɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛnamne ananafo a wɔwɔ wɔn mu nyinaa!Wɔbɛdan mmea.Afoa a etia nʼademude!Wɔbɛfom.
50.38: Ɔyow wɔ nʼasu ahorow so!Ɛbɛyoyow.Efisɛ ɛyɛ ahoni asase,ahoni a ehu bɛma wɔabobɔ adam.
50.39: “Enti sare so mmoa ne mpataku bɛtena hɔ,na ɛhɔ na patu bɛtena.Obiara rentena so bioefi awo ntoatoaso kosi awo ntoatoaso.
50.40: Sɛnea Onyankopɔn tuu Sodom ne Gomorane wɔn nkurow gui no,”Awurade na ose,“saa ara na obiara rentena hɔ;onipa biara rentena mu.
50.41: “Monhwɛ! Asraafo bi fi atifi fam reba;ɔman kɛse ne ahemfo bebree,wɔrehwanyan wɔn afi nsase ano.
50.42: Wokurakura bɛmma ne mpeaw;wɔn tirim yɛ den, na wonni ahummɔbɔ.Wɔn nnyigyei te sɛ po a ɛworo so.Sɛ wɔtete wɔn apɔnkɔ so a,wɔba sɛ mmarima a wɔrekɔ saabɛtow ahyɛ wo so, Ɔbabea Babilonia.
50.43: Babiloniahene ate wɔn ho nsɛm,ne nsa sesa ne ho kwa.Ahohiahia akyekyere noɔyaw a ɛte sɛ ɔbea a ɔrekyem wɔ awo so.
50.44: Sɛnea gyata a ofi Yordan nkyɛkyerɛ murekɔ adidibea frɔmfrɔm no,saa ara na mɛtaa Babilonia fi nʼasase so wɔ bere tiaa bi mu.Hena ne nea mayi no sɛ ɔnyɛ eyi?Hena na ɔte sɛ me, na hena na obetumi ne me adi asi?Na oguanhwɛfo bɛn na obetumi asɔre atia me?”
50.45: Enti tie nea Awurade ahyehyɛ atia Babilonia,nea wabɔ ne tirim sɛ ɔbɛyɛ de atia Babiloniafo asase ni:Nguankuw no mu nkumaa no wɔbɛtwe wɔn akɔ;wɔn nti ɔbɛsɛe adidibea no koraa.
50.46: Babilonia nnommumfa nnyigyei bɛma asase awosow;ne nteɛteɛmu gyegyeegye wɔ amanaman no mu.

51.1: Sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Monhwɛ, mɛkanyan ɔsɛefo bi honhomatia Babilonia ne nnipa a wɔwɔ Leb Kamai.
51.2: Mɛsoma ananafo akɔ Babiloniasɛ wonkohuhuw ne so na wɔnsɛe nʼasase;wobetia no wɔ afanan nyinaawɔ nʼamanehunu da no.
51.3: Mma agyantowni pema nʼagyan,mma ɔnhyɛ ne nkatabo.Mma ne mmerante mfa wɔn ho nni;sɛe nʼasraafo no pasaa.
51.4: Wɔbɛhwehwe ase a wɔatotɔ wɔ Babilonia,a wɔapirapira yiye wɔ ne mmɔnten so.
51.5: Na Israel Nyankopɔn, Asafo Awurade no,nnyaw Israel ne Yuda hɔ ɛ,ɛwɔ mu, afɔdi ahyɛ wɔn asase no so mawɔ Israel Ɔkronkronni no anim.
51.6: “Munguan mfi Babilonia!Muntu mmirika mpere mo nkwa!Mommma wɔnnsɛe mo esiane ne bɔne nti.Awurade aweretɔbere aso;ɔde nea ɛfata no betua no ka.
51.7: Na Babilonia yɛ sikakɔkɔɔ kuruwa wɔ Awurade nsam;ɔmaa asase nyinaa bow nsa.Aman no nom ne nsa;ɛno nti, afei wɔabobɔ adam.
51.8: Babilonia bɛhwe ase abubu mpofirim.Muntwa ne ho agyaadwo!Mompɛ ne yaw no ano aduru;ebia ne ho bɛtɔ no.
51.9: “ ‘Anka yɛbɛsa Babilonia yare,nanso wontumi nsa no yare;momma yennyaw no hɔ na obiara nkɔ nʼankasa asase so,efisɛ nʼatemmu du sorosoro;ɛforo soro te sɛ omununkum.’
51.10: “ ‘Awurade abu yɛn bem.Mommra, momma yɛnka wɔ Sion,nea Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn ayɛ.’
51.11: “Monsew agyan no ano!Momfa nkatabo no!Awurade ahwanyan Mede ahemfo no,efisɛ ne botae ne sɛ ɔbɛsɛe Babilonia.Awurade bɛtɔ were,ɔbɛtɔ were ama nʼasɔrefi no.
51.12: Mompagyaw frankaa bi ntia Babilonia afasu!Mummia bammɔ mu,momma awɛmfo no nnyinagyina.Munsiesie ahintawee!Awurade bɛma nʼatirimpɔw aba mu,nea wahyɛ atia Babilonia no.
51.13: Mo a motete nsuwansuwa bebree hona nnwetɛbona abu mo so,mo awiei aba,bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wotwa mo kyene no.
51.14: Asafo Awurade, aka ne ho ntam sɛ:mede nnipa bɛhyɛ wo ma sɛ tɛwtɛw,na wɔabɔ ose wɔ wo so.
51.15: “Ɔde ne tumi bɔɔ asase;ɔtoo wiase fapem wɔ ne nyansa muna ɔde ne nhumu trɛw ɔsorosoro mu.
51.16: Sɛ ɔbobɔ mu a, ɔsoro nsu woro so;ɔma omununkum ma ne ho so fi nsase ano.Ɔsoma anyinam ka osu hona ɔma mframa bɔ fi ne koradan mu.
51.17: “Onipa biara nnim nyansa, na onni nimdeɛ;sikadwumfo biara anim gu ase, esiane nʼahoni nti.Ne nsɛsode yɛ atoro;wonni ɔhome biara wɔ wɔn mu.
51.18: Wɔn so nni mfaso, wɔn ho yɛ serew;sɛ wɔn atemmu du so a, wɔbɛyera.
51.19: Nea ɔyɛ Yakob Kyɛfa no nte sɛ eyinom,efisɛ ɔno ne ade nyinaa Yɛfoa Israel, abusua a ɛyɛ nʼagyapade nso ka ho.Asafo Awurade ne ne din.
51.20: “Woyɛ me ko abaa,mʼakode a mede kɔ samede wo dwerɛw amanaman,mede wo sɛe ahenni bebree,
51.21: mede wo bobɔ ɔpɔnkɔ ne ne sotefo,teaseɛnam ne ne kafo,
51.22: mede wo dwerɛw ɔbarima ne ɔbea,mede wo dwerɛw akwakoraa ne ɔbabun,mede wo dwerɛw aberante ne ababaa,
51.23: mede wo dwerɛw oguanhwɛfo ne nguankuw,mede wo dwerɛw okuafo ne anantwi,mede wo dwerɛw amradofo ne adwumayɛfo.
51.24: “Metua Babilonia ne wɔn a wɔtete Babilonia ka wɔ mfomso a, wɔayɛ wɔ Sion nyinaa, wɔ wʼanim,” Awurade na ose.
51.25: “Bepɔw sɛefo, me ne wo anya,wo a wosɛe asase nyinaa no,”Awurade na ose.“Mɛteɛ me nsa wɔ wo somepia wo afi abotan no so,na mayɛ wo sɛ bepɔw a ɛnka hwee.
51.26: Wɔremfa ɔbo biara mfi wo so nyɛ tweatiboanaasɛ fapem mpo,efisɛ wobɛda mpan afebɔɔ,”Awurade na ose.
51.27: “Momma frankaa so wɔ asase no so!Monhyɛn torobɛnto no wɔ amanaman no mu!Munsiesie amanaman no mma wontu no so sa;Momfrɛfrɛ saa ahenni ahorow yi mma wɔnko ntia no:Ararat, Mini ne Askenas.Munnyi ɔsahene ntia no;momfa apɔnkɔ manyamanya te sɛ tɛwtɛw mmra.
51.28: Munsiesie amanaman no mma wontu no so sa,mo Mede ahemfo,wɔn amradofo ne wɔn adwumayɛfo nyinaa,ne aman a wodi so nyinaa.
51.29: Asase no wosow, na onukunuku ne mu,efisɛ Awurade atirimpɔw a etia Babiloniasɛ ɔbɛsɛe Babilonia asase aobiara rentumi ntena so no nsakraa ɛ.
51.30: Babilonia dɔmmarima agyae kowɔhyehyɛ wɔn aban mu.Wɔn ahoɔden asa;wɔayɛ sɛ mmea.Wɔatoto nʼatenae ahorow no mu gya,na wɔabubu nʼapon akyi adaban.
51.31: Abɔfo didi sona asomafo didi so awɔrekɔbɔ Babiloniahene amanneɛ se,wɔafa ne kuropɔn no,
51.32: wɔagye asutwabea ahorow a ɛdeda asubɔnten no ano no afa,na wɔde ogya ato ɔwora no mu,na asraafo no abɔ huboa.”
51.33: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, se:“Babilonia Babea ayɛ sɛ, awiporowbeawɔ bere a wɔretiatia hɔ.Aka kakraa bi, na bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wotwa no sɛ nnɔbae no adu.”
51.34: “Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar adwerɛw yɛn,ɔde yɛn ato ɔhaw mu,wayɛ yɛn sɛ ahina a hwee nni mu.Wamene yɛn sɛ ɔwɔ nona ɔde yɛn nneɛma a ɛyɛ dɛ ahyɛ ne yafunu ma,na wapuw yɛn afi nʼanom agu.
51.35: Ma ayakayakade a wɔde dii yɛn honam no mmra Babilonia so,”nnipa a wɔtete Sion na wɔka.“Ma yɛn mogya ngu wɔn a wɔtete Babilonia so,”Yerusalem na ɔka.
51.36: Enti sɛɛ na Awurade se:“Hwɛ, medi mo asɛm ama mona matɔ were ama mo;Mɛma po a ɛyɛ ne de no ayowna mama ne nsubɔnten ayoyow.
51.37: Babilonia bɛyɛ mmubui siw,sakraman atuahodwiriwde ne fɛwdi,baabi a obiara nte.
51.38: Ne nkurɔfo nyinaa bobɔ mu sɛ gyata,wɔbobɔ mu te sɛ gyatamma.
51.39: Nanso bere a wɔahwanyan wɔn ho no,mɛto pon ama wɔnna mama wɔabobow nsa,sɛnea wɔde nteɛteɛmu bedi ahurusi,na wɔadeda a wɔrennyan bio,”Awurade na ose.
51.40: “Mede wɔn bɛbate sɛ nguantenmma a wɔrekokum wɔn,te sɛ adwennini ne mpapo.
51.41: “Sɛnea wɔbɛfa Sesak,wɔbɛfa asase nyinaa so ahohoahoa!Babilonia bɛyɛ ahodwiriwdewɔ amanaman no mu!
51.42: Po bebunkam afa Babilonia so;na nʼasorɔkye bɛkata ne so.
51.43: Ne nkurow bɛda mpan,nweatam a so awo,asase a obiara nte so,na obiara ntu kwan mfa so.
51.44: Mɛtwe Bel aso wɔ Babiloniana mama wapuw nea wamene agu.Amanaman no rento santen nkɔ ne nkyɛn bio.Na Babilonia fasu bebubu.
51.45: “Me nkurɔfo, mumfi ne mu!Muntu mmirika mpere mo nkwa!Munguan mfi Awurade abufuwhyew ano.
51.46: Mommma mo koma ntu na munnsurosɛ mote huhuhuhu wɔ asase no so a;huhuhuhu ba afe yi na foforo ba afe a ɛbɛba,basabasayɛ ho huhuhuhu wɔ asase no soɛfa ɔhene a ɔsɔre tia ɔfoforo ho.
51.47: Na ampa ara bere no bɛbaa mɛtwe Babilonia ahoni aso;nʼasase no nyinaa anim begu asena nʼatɔfo nyinaa bɛtotɔ ase wɔ ne so.
51.48: Ɔsoro ne asase ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaade ahosɛpɛw bɛteɛ mu agu Babilonia so,efisɛ ɔsɛefo befi atifi famabɛtow ahyɛ ne so,”Awurade na ose.
51.49: “Ɛsɛ sɛ Babilonia hwe ase, esiane Israel atɔfo ntisɛnea atɔfo a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa ahwehwe aseesiane Babilonia nti no.
51.50: Mo a mo aguan afi afoa ano,monkɔ, na monntwentwɛn mo nan ase!Monkae Awurade wɔ akyirikyiri asase so,na munnwen Yerusalem ho.”
51.51: “Wɔagu yɛn anim ase,efisɛ wayeyaw yɛnna fɛre akata yɛn anim,efisɛ ananafo ahyɛnAwurade fi kronkronbea ahorow hɔ.”
51.52: “Nanso nna bi reba,” Awurade na ose,“a mɛtwe nʼahoni aso,na nʼasase so nyinaaapirafo besi apini.
51.53: Sɛ Babilonia kɔka soro mpo,na omiamia nʼaban tenten bammɔ mu a,mɛsoma ɔsɛefo ne no abedi asi,”Awurade na ose.
51.54: “Osu nnyigyei bi fi Babilonia,ɔsɛe kɛse bi nnyigyeifi Babiloniafo asase so.
51.55: Awurade bɛsɛe Babilonia;ɔbɛma nʼasotuatua nnyigyei no agyae.Atamfo a wɔte sɛ ahum betu sɛ nsu akɛse;wɔn mmubomu bɛyɛ gyegyeegye.
51.56: Ɔsɛefo bi bɛsɔre atia Babilonia;wɔbɛfa ne dɔmmarima nnommumna wobebubu wɔn tadua mu.Efisɛ Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔhyɛ anan mu;obetua so ka pɛpɛɛpɛ.
51.57: Mɛma nʼadwumayɛfo ne nʼanyansafo abow nsanʼamradonom, ne mpanyimfo ne dɔmmarima nso saa ara;wɔbɛdeda afebɔɔ a wɔrennyan,”sɛɛ na ɔhempɔn a ne din ne Asafo Awurade, no se.
51.58: Sɛɛ na Asafo Awurade, se:“Wobedwiriw Babilonia afasu a ɛtrɛw no agu famna wɔbɛto nʼapon atenten no mu gya;nnipa no haw wɔn ho kwa,ɔman no adwumayɛ ma ogya no dɛw mmom.”
51.59: Eyi ne asɛm a Yeremia ka kyerɛɛ Neria babarima Seraia a ɔyɛ adwumayɛfo panyin na ɔyɛ Maseia nena no, bere a ɔne Yudahene Sedekia kɔɔ Babilonia wɔ nʼadedi afe a ɛto so anan no mu.
51.60: Na Yeremia akyerɛw amanehunu a ɛbɛba Babilonia so no nyinaa agu nhoma mmobɔwee so, nea wakyerɛw a ɛfa Babilonia ho nyinaa.
51.61: Ɔka kyerɛɛ Seraia se, “Sɛ wudu Babilonia a, hwɛ sɛ wobɛkenkan saa nsɛm yi nyinaa sɛnea obiara bɛte.
51.62: Afei ka se, ‘Awurade, woaka se wobɛsɛe beae yi sɛnea onipa anaa aboa biara rentumi ntena so; na ɛbɛda mpan afebɔɔ.’
51.63: Sɛ wokenkan nhoma mmobɔwee yi wie a, kyekyere fam ɔbo ho, na tow kyene Asubɔnten Eufrate mu.
51.64: Afei ka se, ‘Sɛɛ na Babilonia ne ne nkurɔfo bɛmem a wɔrensɔre bio, esiane amanehunu a mede bɛba ne so no nti.’ ”Yeremia nsɛm no awiei ni.

52.1: Yerusalem AsehweSedekia dii ade no, na wadi mfirihyia aduonu baako. Odii ade wɔ Yerusalem mfirihyia dubaako. Na ne na din de Hamutal a ɔyɛ Yeremia a ofi Libna no babea.
52.2: Ɔyɛɛ bɔne wɔ Awurade ani so, sɛnea Yehoiakim yɛe no.
52.3: Awurade abufuw nti na eyinom nyinaa baa Yerusalem ne Yuda so, na akyiri no, oyii nʼani fii wɔn so.Afei, Sedekia sɔre tiaa Babiloniahene.
52.4: Ɔsram Tebet (bɛyɛ Ɔpɛpɔn) da a ɛto so dunum wɔ Sedekia ahenni mfe akron so no, ɔhene Nebukadnessar dii nʼakofo nyinaa anim, bɛko tiaa Yerusalem. Wotwaa kuropɔn no ho hyiae. Wɔbobɔɔ mpampim wɔ kuropɔn no afasu ho.
52.5: Wotuaa kuropɔn no kosii Ɔhene Sedekia adedi afe a ɛto so dubaako no mu.
52.6: Eduu ɔsram a ɛto so anan no da a ɛto so akron no, na ɔkɔm a asi kuropɔn no mu no ano ayɛ den a mu nnipa no nnya aduan nni.
52.7: Na wɔpaee kuropɔn no fasu mu, na asraafo no nyinaa guanee. Wɔfaa ɔhene turo mu fii kuropɔn no mu anadwo, kɔfaa ɔpon a ɛwɔ afasu abien no ntam, de wɔn ani kyerɛɛ Araba.
52.8: Nanso Babilonia asraafo no taa Ɔhene Sedekia kɔtoo no wɔ Yeriko tataw so. Na nʼasraafo no nyinaa afi ne ho abɔ ahwete,
52.9: na wɔkyeree no.Wɔfaa no dommum de no kɔmaa Babiloniahene wɔ Ribla a ɛwɔ Hamat asase so, na hɔ na obuu no atɛn.
52.10: Ribla hɔ na Babiloniahene kunkum Sedekia mmabarima wɔ nʼanim na okum Yudafo adwumayɛfo nyinaa nso.
52.11: Afei otutuu Sedekia ani, de kɔbere mfrafrae mpokyerɛ guu no sɛ ɔde no rekɔ Babilonia, hɔ na ɔde no too afiase kosii ne wuda.
52.12: Ab ɔsram (bɛyɛ Ɔsannaa) da ɛto so dunan wɔ afe a ɛyɛ Nebukadnessar mfe dunkron adedi mu no, Nebusaradan a ɔyɛ awɛmfo so panyin a ɔyɛ Babiloniahene mpanyimfo no mu baako no kɔɔ Yerusalem.
52.13: Ɔde ogya too Awurade asɔredan, ahemfi ne afi a ɛwɔ Yerusalem nyinaa mu. Ɔhyew ofi biara a edi mu.
52.14: Awɛmfo so panyin no hwɛ maa Babilonia asraafo no bubuu Yerusalem afasu no.
52.15: Ɔsahene Nebusaradan a na otua awɛmfo no ano no faa wɔn a wodi hia no mu bi, wɔn a wɔkaa kuropɔn no mu, adwumfo a wɔaka ne wɔn a wɔkɔdɔm Babiloniahene no kɔɔ nnommum mu.
52.16: Nanso Nebusaradan gyaa wɔn a wodi hia wɔ asase no so no nkae sɛ wɔnhwɛ bobe nturo ne mfuw no.
52.17: Babiloniafo no bubuu kɔbere mfrafrae afadum, nnyinasode a wotumi moma so ne kɔbere mfrafrae Po a na ɛwɔ Awurade asɔredan mu, na wɔde kɔbere mfrafrae no nyinaa kɔɔ Babilonia.
52.18: Afei wɔfaa nkuku, nsofi, kanea ntamabamma ntwitwaso, ɔpete nkuruwa, nsanka, mprɛte ne kɔbere mfrafrae nneɛma a wɔde yɛ ɔsom adwuma wɔ asɔredan mu no nso kɔe.
52.19: Ɔhene awɛmfo sahene no faa nkankyee, nkankyee ntrantraa, ɔpete nkuruwa, nkuku, kaneannua, nsanka, mprɛte ne nkuruwa a wɔde di ɔnom afɔrebɔ ho dwuma no kɔe; wɔde sikakɔkɔɔ ankasa anaa dwetɛ na ɛyɛɛ eyinom nyinaa.
52.20: Kɔbere mfrafrae a wɔde yɛɛ afadum abien no, Po no ne anantwinini dumien a ɛwɔ nʼase ne nnyinaso a wɔmema so, na wontumi nkari saa nneɛma a Ɔhene Salomo yɛɛ wɔ Awurade asɔredan mu yi mu duru.
52.21: Na afadum no biara sorokɔ yɛ anammɔn aduonu ason na ne dantaban mu nso yɛ anammɔn dunwɔtwe. Emu da tokuru na ne hankare no mu piw yɛ nsateaa anan.
52.22: Na kɔbere mfrafrae ntaaso a esi ɔfadum baako so no sorokɔ yɛ anammɔn ason ne fa a, wɔde kɔbere mfrafrae atoaa ahyehyɛ ho nyinaa ahyia. Afadum a aka no nso a wɔde kɔbere mfrafrae atoaa ahyehyɛ ho no te sɛ baako no.
52.23: Na Kɔbere mfrafrae atoaa aba a ɛsensɛn ntaaso no ano no yɛ aduɔkron asia, na nea ɛkata ntaaso no ho yɛ ɔha.
52.24: Awɛmfo no sahene no faa ɔsɔfopanyin Seraia, abediakyiri Sefania ne ɔponanoahwɛfo baasa no nnommum.
52.25: Ɔfaa ɔpanyin a otua asraafo no ano, ne adehye afotufo baason fii nnipa a na wɔda so wɔ kuropɔn no mu no mu. Afei ɔfaa ɔkyerɛwfo a na ɔyɛ adwumayɛfo panyin ma wɔn a wɔfa nnipa ma wɔkɔyɛ asraafo wɔ asase no so, ne nʼadwumayɛfo no mu aduosia a ohuu wɔn wɔ kuropɔn no mu no.
52.26: Ɔsahene Nebusaradan de wɔn nyinaa kɔɔ Babiloniahene anim wɔ Ribla.
52.27: Ɔhene no ma wokunkum wɔn wɔ Ribla a ɛwɔ Hamat.Enti wotwaa Yuda asu fii nʼasase so.
52.28: Nnipa dodow a Nebukadnessar de wɔn kɔɔ nkoasom mu ni:nʼahenni afe a ɛto so ason mu,Yudafo ,;
52.29: Nebukadnessar ahenni afe a ɛto so dunwɔtwe mu,nnipa a wofi Yerusalem, ;
52.30: nʼahenni afe a ɛto so aduonu abiɛsa mu,ɔsahene Nebusaradan, a otua ɔhene awɛmfo ano no de Yudafo  kɔɔ nnommum mu.Nnipa no nyinaa dodow yɛ ,.
52.31: Wogyaa YehoiakyinYudahene Yehoiakyin nnommumfa afe a ɛto so aduasa ason mu a Ewil-Merodak bɛyɛɛ Babiloniahene no, oyii Yudahene Yehoiakyin fii afiase wɔ ɔsram a ɛto so dumien no da a ɛto so aduonu anum.
52.32: Ɔkaa abodwosɛm kyerɛɛ no, na ɔmaa no dibea a ɛwɔ anuonyam sen ahemfo a wɔne no wɔ Babilonia no de.
52.33: Enti Yehoiakin yii nʼafiase ntade guu nkyɛn, na efi saa da no odidii wɔ ɔhene didipon so bere biara, kosii ne wuda.
52.34: Na Babiloniahene no san maa Yehoiakin sika bere ano bere ano, ma ɔde tuatua ne ho aka, kosii ne wuda.
